titulo_empleo: DevOps Automation Engineer - with Great Benefits
descripcion_empleo:
We are on the lookout for a remarkable DevOps Automation Engineer to join our productive team at trades.org in Guayaquil, Guayaquil (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time DevOps Automation Engineer is an incredible opportunity to develop competitive skills.If you are strong in problem-solving, cooperation and have the right experience for the job, then apply for the position of DevOps Automation Engineer at trades.org today!We provide software and services that help trade professionals (general contractors, plumbers, electricians) start, run, and grow their home services businesses. We're recently funded, rapidly growing, and would love to have you join our team!  trades.org is a recently funded technology company that helps trade professionals (general contractors, plumbers, electricians) start, run, and grow their small businesses. We're looking for skilled  DevOps Automation Engineers  who want to join our global team and are excited to help our customers build businesses that impact on the world around them.
 In this role, you will be responsible for implementing tools and processes that help our application developers be more productive and efficient, as well as provisioning, managing, and monitoring the infrastructure that our applications run on.  You will work on projects that involve:  developing and maintaining configuration tools, automation scripts, and continuous delivery pipelines  implementing automated monitoring and testing processes  provisioning and managing cloud clusters, swarms, and databases  helping manage security, access control, and performance  To be successful in this role, you should:  be fluent in English, Spanish, or both  be proficient in at least two programming languages, preferably Bash and one of TypeScript, Python, or Go  have expertise with AWS and managing its various compute, storage, database, and networking appliances  have expertise with container development, deployment, and orchestration using Docker or Kubernetes  have experience with configuration management using tools like Ansible or Chef, and IaC tools like Terraform or AWS CDK  be familiar with the serverless paradigm and with tools like Serverless and AWS Lambda  be able to build performant CI/CD pipelines using tools like Github Actions or Jenkins  We prefer candidates that have set up and used application monitoring using tools like New Relic, Data Dog, or PagerDuty. Familiarity with role management using AWS IAM or comparable tools, monorepos, Yarn, and Yarn PnP, and JavaScript frameworks like React and Node.js is a plus. And we really like it when candidates are interested in modern DevOps innovations like Github CodeSpaces and Dagger.io.  Why Us:  We care about our team  . We believe that work-life balance is incredibly important and will work with you to find a schedule and workload that meets your needs.  We care about our culture  . Everyone on our team is honest, hardworking, and easy to get along with. We keep work simple: have a positive attitude and get your work done.  We want you to grow  . We pay competitive wages, provide career counseling and opportunities for professional development, and subsidize or pay for training programs.  Want something specific? Let us know.  Every team member is different, so we'll strive to meet you where you're at. Depending on your specific needs, we can subsidize or pay for co-working space, internet access, and specific hardware or software that helps you be better at your job.  Things to Consider  Not every job is a good fit for every person. Here are some things to consider about this role:  We’re a small team and you’ll be working remotely. You’ll always find support when you need it, but we expect you to work well independently.  You’re going to be asked to do tasks that fall outside this job description. When challenges arise, we depend on every team member to come together to help overcome them.  You're going to need to learn and try new things. You should be comfortable with trial and error and be resilient to mistakes and temporary failures. We’re OK with rolling with the punches; you should be too.  Application Process  We want to be sure this role is fulfilling for you, value-adding for the business, and fun for everybody. These are the steps in our mutual interview:  Apply for the position using your resume, if available.  Next, we'll email you an invitation to complete a brief questionnaire (~10 min).  If we're a good fit, we'll invite you to complete a skill-based project or assessment. This typically takes 60-90 minutes and we'll pay you for your time.  And if that goes well, we'll schedule you for a video interview with members of our team! We encourage you to apply and look forward to getting to know you!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- trades.org es una empresa de tecnología financiada recientemente que ayuda a los profesionales del comercio (contratistas generales, plomeros, electricistas) a iniciar, administrar y hacer crecer sus pequeñas empresas. Estamos buscando  Ingenieros de Automatización de DevOps  calificados que quieran unirse a nuestro equipo global y estén entusiasmados de ayudar a nuestros clientes a construir negocios que impacten en el mundo que los rodea.  En esta función, será responsable de implementar herramientas y procesos que ayuden a nuestros desarrolladores de aplicaciones a ser más productivos y eficientes, así como también aprovisionar, administrar y monitorear la infraestructura en la que se ejecutan nuestras aplicaciones.  Trabajarás en proyectos que impliquen:  desarrollar y mantener herramientas de configuración, scripts de automatización y canalizaciones de entrega continua  implementar procesos automatizados de monitoreo y prueba  aprovisionamiento y gestión de clústeres en la nube, enjambres y bases de datos  ayudar a administrar la seguridad, el control de acceso y el rendimiento  Para tener éxito en este rol, usted debe:  tener fluidez en inglés, español, o ambos  ser competente en al menos dos lenguajes de programación, preferiblemente Bash y uno de TypeScript, Python o Go  tener experiencia con AWS y administrar sus diversos dispositivos de cómputo, almacenamiento, bases de datos y redes  tener experiencia en el desarrollo, la implementación y la orquestación de contenedores con Docker o Kubernetes  tener experiencia con la gestión de configuración usando herramientas como Ansible o Chef, y herramientas IaC como Terraform o AWS CDK  estar familiarizado con el paradigma sin servidor y con herramientas como Serverless y AWS Lambda  ser capaz de construir canalizaciones de CI/CD de alto rendimiento usando herramientas como Github Actions o Jenkins  Preferimos candidatos que hayan configurado y utilizado herramientas de monitoreo de aplicaciones como New Relic, Data Dog o PagerDuty. La familiaridad con la administración de roles mediante AWS IAM o herramientas comparables, monorepos, Yarn e Yarn PnP, y marcos de JavaScript como React y Node.js es una ventaja. Y nos gusta mucho cuando los candidatos están interesados en innovaciones modernas de DevOps como Github CodeSpaces y Dagger.io.  Porque nosotros:  Nos preocupamos por nuestro equipo  . Creemos que el equilibrio entre el trabajo y la vida es increíblemente importante y trabajaremos con usted para encontrar un horario y una carga de trabajo que satisfaga sus necesidades.  Nos preocupamos por nuestra cultura  . Todos en nuestro equipo son honestos, trabajadores y fáciles de tratar. Mantenemos el trabajo simple: tenga una actitud positiva y haga su trabajo.  Queremos que crezcas  . Pagamos salarios competitivos, brindamos orientación profesional y oportunidades de desarrollo profesional, y subsidiamos o pagamos programas de capacitación. ¿Quieres algo específico? Haznos saber.  Cada miembro del equipo es diferente, por lo que nos esforzaremos por encontrarlo donde se encuentre. Dependiendo de sus necesidades específicas, podemos subsidiar o pagar el espacio de trabajo conjunto, el acceso a Internet y el hardware o software específico que lo ayuda a ser mejor en su trabajo.  Cosas para considerar  No todos los trabajos son adecuados para todas las personas. Aquí hay algunas cosas a considerar sobre este rol:  Somos un equipo pequeño y trabajarás de forma remota. Siempre encontrará apoyo cuando lo necesite, pero esperamos que trabaje bien de forma independiente.  Se le pedirá que realice tareas que quedan fuera de esta descripción de trabajo. Cuando surgen desafíos, dependemos de que cada miembro del equipo se una para ayudar a superarlos.  Vas a necesitar aprender y probar cosas nuevas. Debe sentirse cómodo con la prueba y el error y ser resistente a los errores y fallas temporales. Estamos bien con rodar con los golpes; tú también deberías estarlo.  Proceso de solicitud  Queremos asegurarnos de que este rol sea satisfactorio para usted, que agregue valor al negocio y que sea divertido para todos. Estos son los pasos de nuestra entrevista mutua:  Solicite el puesto utilizando su currículum, si está disponible.  A continuación, le enviaremos una invitación por correo electrónico para completar un breve cuestionario (~10 min).  Si encajamos bien, lo invitaremos a completar un proyecto o una evaluación basada en habilidades. Esto suele tardar entre 60 y 90 minutos y le pagaremos por su tiempo. descripcion_empleo: We are looking to hire an experienced Windows Forms (C#) Engineer to join our incredible team at Next Technology Professionals Ltd. in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Windows Forms (C#) Engineer is an amazing opportunity to develop relevant skills.If you are strong in critical thinking, persuasion and have the right mindset for the job, then apply for the position of Windows Forms (C#) Engineer at Next Technology Professionals Ltd. today! SystemOne is searching for a Windows Forms developer to build & maintain new and  existing client applications targeting Windows 7 & Windows 10.   As an Applicant You are Expected to Have: ● At least two years of professional software development experience building,  deploying, and maintaining Windows forms applications. ● Proficiency with client libraries, TLS, SQLite, MS SQL Server. ● Experience with error & crash reporting frameworks used by WIndows client  applications. ● Experience with .NET data encryption libraries. ● Ability to work & communicate with the team in English. ● Experience building setup packages for Windows applications. ● Experience in setting up the infrastructure required to publish over-the-air updates to  Windows applications. ● Experience using Git for source code control. ● Experience writing unit tests in C#. ● Familiar with debugging tools and methods.   Responsibilities: ● Design small footprint client side applications that are targeted at PCs running  Windows 7 & Windows 10. ● Deploy updates and installation packages for Windows applications. ● Troubleshoot installation and runtime issues that are reported from remote locations. ● Optimise requests made from Windows applications. ● Build data upload workflows that are tolerant to partitions in the network. ● Collect error and crash logs from a fleet of remote Windows PCs and monitor overall  fleet health. ● Make strategic technical decisions that cater for system flexibility through safe  updates and configuration changes. ● Write unit tests that integrate into deployment pipelines. ● Collaborate with an excellent team of engineers to produce high quality, performant & secure information exchange back-ends for healthcare initiatives. ● Document APIs and expected system behaviour. titulo_empleo: Senior Frontend Engineer - Urgent
descripcion_empleo: We are looking to hire a competitive Senior Frontend Engineer to join our dynamic team at Harris BPO in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Senior Frontend Engineer is a fantastic opportunity to develop productive skills.If you are strong in adaptability, presentation and have the right mindset for the job, then apply for the position of Senior Frontend Engineer at Harris BPO today! Company Description  Atlan is a modern data collaboration workspace (like Github for engineering or Figma for design). By acting as a virtual hub for data assets ranging from tables and dashboards to models & code, Atlan enables teams to create a single source of truth for all their data assets, and collaborate across the modern data stack through deep integrations with tools like Slack, BI tools, data science tools and more.  Proud to be enabling amazing teams like Plaid, Postman & Unilever.  Backed by top investors like Insight, Sequoia & Waterbridge and amazing angels such as the founding teams of Snowflake, Looker, Stitch  Recognised as a Gartner Cool Vendor in the inaugural report on DataOps, one of the top 3 companies globally.   Job Description  Hello, we are Atlan!  A home for data teams around the world. Atlan makes it easier for diverse data users – business users, product managers, analysts, and engineers – to collaborate effectively. (Think of what Salesforce is for sales teams or GitHub for engineering teams). (Check out our website ,  product tour , and  docs .)  Built for the humans of data, by the humans of data  At Atlan, we started as a data team ourselves tackling problems like national healthcare and poverty alleviation with data science. (Check out our  TEDx talk and  case studies .) The problem: After working on 200+ data projects, we learned how tough it was to scale data teams. Data teams are one of the most interdisciplinary teams ever created. They're made up of analysts, data scientists, engineers, business users – diverse people with their own tooling preferences, skill sets, and "DNA" that need to come together. This leads to  collaboration chaos  .  We were awoken with crisis calls every second day for the minutest of issues — from troubleshooting why a number on a dashboard was incorrect to difficulties in getting access to the right data set! Atlan started with us building tools to make our own data team more agile.  These tools made our team 6x more agile  , helping us take on amazing projects like building India's National Data Platform used by India's Prime Minister. The best part — this was built by an eight-member team, the fastest project of its kind to go live, in a record twelve months instead of the projected three years.  We asked, could the tooling we built for ourselves help data teams around the world? That's how Atlan was born. We're on a mission to help data teams around the world do their lives' best work.  Read our co-founder Prukalpa's article on the half-a-decade backstory that drives everything we do at Atlan and our journey of failing three times before we figured out the real solution.   We're growing fast  In the last few months, we have onboarded some dream customers, started working with some amazing partners, and watched as our team spread across 10+ countries.  Atlan was named a Gartner Cool Vendor in DataOps, one of the top three companies globally (and one of the fastest companies to make the list). We were also named in Gartner’s inaugural Market Guide for Active Metadata and as a Top 5 Global Innovator in DataOps by IDC.  We're backed by top investors (like Insight Partners, Sequoia, and Waterbridge) and the shapers of the modern data stack (including the founders and CEOs of Snowflake, Looker, Stitch, and DataRobot) as our early investors.  Watch this three-minute video of  our journey so far and where we're going (in conversation with Sequoia Capital).   We build with all our  We believe that data teams deserve fundamentally better software experiences. Data is chaos, but that doesn't mean that work should be!  Love what Superhuman, Slack, Notion, Quip, and Figma have done for the modern workplace? Come build the future for data teams with Atlan!  What will you do?  Lead the Frontend Team, and work with the larger Engineering Team to design beautiful products and thoughtful interactions that make the experience of working with data seamless  Help us design and optimize the performance of our products.  Prioritize user experience while building for scale. (Some of our users work with large data sets and have complex workflows that they manage with Atlan.) Design and develop products for diverse personas — e.g. data analysts in a large FMCG company, data scientists working with a large fintech organization, or business users in a product startup.  Collaborate across teams to achieve company-wide engineering goals and contribute to building a great engineering culture.   What makes you a match for us?  You have experience building a product from scratch or being in the initial frontend team of any startup.  You have worked on building and debugging complex systems at scale.  You have a knack for picking the right set of tools for the job at hand.  You are an expert in JavaScript, have worked with different design patterns, have a desire to deepen your knowledge in  Vue.js or any other new libraries.  You have exposure to different JavaScript libraries or have worked on product migration.  You have experience using a design system before and building a modular component codebase.  You have a strong sense of customer empathy and a desire to influence product direction.  You love crafting beautiful UI and solid UX/DX to solve the users’ problems. You have a knack to go one step further to delight the user.  You understand the big data landscape and empathize with the problems of data teams.  You have previously worked in a startup environment, preferably with a SaaS product.  You love open source as much we do! Bonus points if you are an active contributor to the community (e.g. speak at conferences and meetups, etc). Benefits of working as a Senior Frontend Engineer in Teletrabajo:● Company offers great benefits ● Opportunities to grow● Competitive salary

descripcion_empleo: We are looking to hire a brilliant Coordinador de Análisis Financiero. to join our awesome team at EXTERNA in Cuenca, Cuenca (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Coordinador de Análisis Financiero. is a terrific opportunity to develop excellent skills.If you are strong in presentation, people management and have the right personality for the job, then apply for the position of Coordinador de Análisis Financiero. at EXTERNA today!Misión del cargo: Brindar apoyo a la Gerencia Administrativa y Financiera en los proyectos desde el ámbito financiero, en temas relacionados entre otros con costos unitarios, precios, escenarios posibles, etc. Nivel de instrucción: Título de Tercer Nivel en Contador Público Auditor, Administrador de Empresas, Economista o títulos similares. Experiencia: De 2 años de experiencia en cargos similares. Competencias: Habilidad analítica y numérica, Orientación a resultados y Trabajo en Equipo. Conocimientos técnicos requeridos: Alto conocimiento en análisis financiero, habilidad en el manejo de hojas de cálculo, bases de datos y paquete office y software financiero. Análisis estadístico, Diagnóstico financiero y análisis de información, Conocimiento en legislación financiera y tributaria aplicada. Funciones Principales: - Consolidar y analizar datos financieros como presupuestos, estado de resultados, etc) enfocada en los objetivos institucionales y la situación financiera de la compañía. - Recopilar y analizar datos para estructurar informes sobre el estado financiero, sus riesgos y proponer acciones. - Desarrollar modelos financieros que faciliten una evaluación comparativa para la toma de decisiones. - Proporcionar alternativas y recomendaciones creativas para reducir costes y mejorar los resultados financieros. - Realizar estudios de rendimiento ( histórico, presente y futuro) para desarrollar modelos de previsión. - Mantener actualizados sus indicadores de gestión y analizarlos oportunamente. - Apoyar en la elaboración del presupuesto anual de la empresa, así como en mediante la ejecución de actividades operativas y de revisión de hojas elaboradas por otros procesos. titulo_empleo: Engineering Manager - Immediate Start
descripcion_empleo:
We are looking for a creative Engineering Manager to join our growing team at Pinnacle in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Engineering Manager is a fantastic opportunity to develop exceptional skills.If you are strong in presentation, people management and have the right personality for the job, then apply for the position of Engineering Manager at Pinnacle today! Location:  International, Anywhere; 100% Remote
  What You’ll Work On  Create a brand new product.  Take ownership of a new, unannounced product that we have in the works, which includes both a beautiful, first-class CLI experience and a powerful web UI. Join a small team to help design, prototype, test, launch, and develop this exciting new initiative that we believe will transform the software industry.  Work alongside product and report to the founders  . You’ll collaborate with a product manager on the vision, usability, and business viability of our product, and take primary responsibility for our ability to execute. Further, you’ll report directly to one of Gruntwork’s co-founders.  Manage a small team of stellar engineers. Manage a team of 3 engineers to help them organize and ship their work, provide mentorship, guide their careers at Gruntwork, and position them for success.  Write code. Your primary job is to manage the team, but while it’s still a small team, you will have time left over to write code, helping to directly build out the product and set its technical direction.   Your Ideal Background  You have direct experience managing software engineers.  You have direct experience working as a software engineer.  Strong knowledge of Go is strongly preferred.  Bonus points for knowledge of Terraform, AWS, and other DevOps tools.  You enjoy writing and have a clear, concise style.  You are equally comfortable making impact through others, or leading small projects yourself if needed.  Bonus points for a sense of humor, empathy, and curiosity.   Compatible time zones  This role is specifically for  European time zones  , though you can be located in almost any country as long as your time zone is no further west than the UK (GMT+0/BST) and no further east than Germany (GMT+1/GMT+2). We’ve found that when everyone on the team is located in a similar time zone, it’s easier to collaborate and there’s much less pressure to stay up late or get up early, so this is a hard constraint, even if you’re willing to work hours different from your current time zone.   Benefits  Our benefits reflect our values. We believe compensation should be fair, transparent, and generous. We hire Grunts in many countries, so some details may vary.  Location Independent, Above-Market Salary.  To reduce bias and increase transparency, we compute all salaries  using formulas . The formula factors in your title and uses a multiplier to produce a result that’s above market for that title. Our salaries are location independent.  Equity  .  To reduce bias and increase transparency, we compute all stock grants  using formulas . The formula for equity factors in your title and your employee number. Moreover, we offer a Change in Control Bonus Plan, inspired by  Progressive Equity , where if there is a large exit event, employees end up with a larger portion of the proceeds (rather than the founders hogging it all).  Profit-Sharing Bonus.  We set aside a pot of money at the end of each year based on profits and distribute bonuses according to a formula that uses as inputs your level within the company and the length of your tenure at the company.  Hardware Budget.  We’ll buy you a brand new 16″ Apple MacBook Pro (or other computer of your choosing of equivalent value) upon joining. It will be owned by you, not the company.  Personal Budget.  We’ll give you a personal budget of $1,000 USD per month to spend on your workspace (e.g., a co-working space), health (e.g., gym, yoga), time (e.g., babysitter), and/or learning (e.g., books, courses).  Minimum Vacation Policy.  We require that you take  at least 4 weeks of vacation per year; take more, if needed.  Medical/Dental/Vision Insurance.  We offer a range of high-quality plans with a large portion paid by the company. For countries other than the US, this includes extra coverage on top of your statutory insurance. Benefits of working as a Engineering Manager in Teletrabajo:● Excellent benefits● Advancement opportunities● Advantageous package

titulo_empleo: Data Engineering Lead - Immediate Start
descripcion_empleo:
We are searching for a creative Data Engineering Lead to join our all-star team at Harris BPO in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Data Engineering Lead is a fantastic opportunity to develop productive skills.If you are strong in persuasion, presentation and have the right experience for the job, then apply for the position of Data Engineering Lead at Harris BPO today! About CoW Protocol
 CoW Protocol is on a mission to create the fairest and most efficientvenue for exchanging assets on all EVM-compatible chains. Since launching a year ago, we have passed $15bn (yes, billion) in trade volume, and become the 4th most popular DEX Aggregator on the market -- now we're aiming for #1. If you are a high-performing team player who wants to work on some of the most important problems in Ethereum (MEV protection, batch auctions, and more), we want to talk to you! Location: We are a fully remote team and although we hire globally, there is a preference for this role to be based in Europe or remote +/- 3 hours CEST time  Position: Full-time contractor   About the role  We are looking for a Data Engineering Lead, to support our data team and help our product, business, and marketing teams make better data-driven decisions. You will lead and build the data team and work with engineers and product specialists across the company to help us compile, analyze and visualize relevant data about our product and relevant market trends.  This is a brand-new position. You will have a unique opportunity to help scale the data team, build the process, as well as to be hands-on. Don't miss it!  What you’ll do  Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging data to inform product and business decisions and marketing content.  Help the data team to grow, plan and prioritize their initiatives for maximum impact across the company.  Together with experienced engineers on the team, architect and build our data engineering infrastructure for long-term sustainability and success.  Proactively suggest new types of data that provide relevant insights to the product/business/marketing team.  Proactively observe and present trends and new insights to the wider team.  Ensure easy access to relevant data trends for all team members.  Connect with the Ethereum community, follow trends and stay up to date about new analytical tools that help extract relevant data from Ethereum.  Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data-gathering techniques.   Who you are  You have 5+ years of relevant experience, partly in a leadership role  Someone  hands-on  , who can lead a team, as well as do coding  You are obsessed with numbers  and a strong believer in data-driven decision making  Familiarity with the following software/tools:  Coding knowledge and experience with several languages:  Python  , Rust, JavaScript, etc.  Proficiency in querying databases and using statistical computer languages ( SQL  , GraphQL, Pandas, etc.)  Knowledge and experience in statistical and data mining techniques.  Experience analyzing data from 3rd party providers  Experience with distributed data/computing tools: Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Dune Analytics, etc.  Experience visualizing/presenting data for stakeholders ( BI ) Excellent communication skills for coordinating across teams.  Experience working with and creating data architectures.  A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.  Strong problem-solving and analytical skills with an emphasis on product development.  Self-motivated and proactive team player, yet also able to multi-task and work independently.   What we can offer you  Flexible work environment  : join one of our hubs in Berlin or Lisbon or work remotely with the option of joining a local coworking space;  Competitive compensation and a stake in the success of the project;  Regular trips to reunite with the rest of the team;  Conference budget to keep up to date with the developments of the ecosystem;  Learning budget to support your higher ambitions;  Impact: If you are joining a startup, and you can make a huge difference.  Your work matters! But most importantly - grow with us! We're growing rapidly, the industry is expanding fast, and we have a lot to do. If you love taking the initiative and getting things done, there are a lot of opportunities for you at CoW Protocol. We’re enthusiastic about our shared mission and enjoy spending time together!Benefits of working as a Data Engineering Lead in Teletrabajo:● Excellent benefits● Opportunities to grow● Attractive package

descripcion_empleo: We are searching for an expert Gerente Servicio Técnico to join our diverse team at B. Braun in Quito, Quito (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Gerente Servicio Técnico is a fantastic opportunity to develop competitive skills.If you are strong in presentation, leadership and have the right personality for the job, then apply for the position of Gerente Servicio Técnico at B. Braun today! Eres parte importante de nuestro futuro. ¡Esperamos ser también parte del tuyo! En B. Braun, protegemos y mejoramos la salud de las personas en todo el mundo. Esta es, también, nuestra visión para la Investigación y el Desarrollo. Ves la complejidad como una oportunidad, la calidad y la sostenibilidad son criterios importantes para tu trabajo. Nos gustaría trabajar contigo en las soluciones del mañana. Así, juntos, es como creamos una atención médica sostenible: a nivel local, en las regiones, los países y el mundo entero. Eso es Sharing Expertise.  Gerente Servicio Técnico  Gerente Servicio Técnico  Código de referencia DMCO78-75645 Liderar y coordinar el trabajo del departamento de Servicio Técnico con el fin de garantizar y mantener las buenas prácticas de reparación y mantenimiento de equipos médicos e Instrumental que la empresa comercializa. Asegurar la calidad en el trabajo realizado por reparación y mantenimiento tanto correctivo como preventivo.  Brindar un soporte certificado, eficiente, con un alto nivel técnico y ejecutivo a los clientes internos y externos, cumpliendo los estándares de calidad bajo los lineamientos de B. Braun o del fabricante.  Obligaciones y responsabilidades  Liderar y fortalecer el departamento de Servicio Técnico a nivel nacional.  Certificar y mantener el servicio técnico de acuerdo con los lineamientos exigidos por parte de los fabricantes.  Conocer los aspectos técnicos de los equipos médicos y/o instrumental para garantizar una buena reparación y/o mantenimiento.  Coordinar, supervisar, asignar el trabajo del personal a su cargo a fin de que las actividades del servicio técnico sean realizadas cumpliendo los estándares de calidad y de satisfacción al cliente.  Capacitar y entrenar al personal a su cargo en cuanto a los estándares de calidad y procedimientos establecidos para la recuperación y mantenimiento de los equipos médicos e Instrumental, garantizando su funcionalidad y durabilidad.  Validar y consolidar los listados para la adquisición de software, herramientas, equipos, repuestos y partes que garantice el adecuado funcionamiento del departamento de servicio técnico.  Evaluar, definir y gestionar la documentación requerida para el envío de equipos médicos al fabricante en coordinación con el departamento de Comercio Exterior.  Realizar viajes periódicos a nivel nacional para garantizar la satisfacción del cliente certificando que los sistemas adquiridos de B. Braun Medical estén funcionales y otorgando alternativas para que los sistemas puedan estar habilitados.  Asegurar el cumplimiento de los cronogramas de los mantenimientos preventivos y correctivos por garantías o por contratos firmados tanto en clientes públicos como privados.  Registrar y hacer todas las tareas realizadas diariamente en el módulo CRM, sin excepción, si no existen requerimientos y/o tareas, se debe comunicar y solicitar al respectivo cliente interno. En caso de persistir la ausencia del requerimiento y/o tarea se deben generar auto requerimiento y comunicar del evento al encargado del proyecto del CRM.  Controlar e inventario de activos fijos bajo su responsabilidad (equipamiento médico, herramientas y repuestos).  Apoyar al equipo comercial para la definición de participación en licitaciones públicas, privadas y generación de contratos de mantenimiento.  Competencias profesionales 5 años de experiencia en posiciones de Ingeniería y/o Mantenimiento de preferencia en empresas de Dispositivos médicos.  Profesional en Ingeniería Electrónica (requerido).  Inglés avanzado.  Competencias personales  Enfoque en el logro.  Contribuir al éxito del equipo.  Ejecución eficiente.  Liderazgo.  Nuestra oferta  Ven a formar parte de una cultura cuyo lema es Sharing Expertise: desarrollar soluciones eficientes a través de un diálogo constructivo con profesionales de la sanidad y pacientes. Trabaja en B. Braun para proteger y mejorar la salud de las personas en todo el mundo. Podemos ofrecerte tareas interesantes y variadas, y oportunidades excelentes para progresar, así como un salario atractivo con amplias ventajas, todo ello en una empresa familiar y sostenible. DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Communications, Marketing, & Social Media SupportUnder the supervision of the Executive Director for IT Business Operations, makes recommendations to the IT&IP Division Leadership Team on divisional publication goals and policy issues regarding marketing strategies, cost effectivness, and delivery of IT&IP communications. Supports and prepares an integrated marketing plan, including web development, social media, publications, and email communications from multiple departments. Develops, implements and manages service-oriented marketing and communications programs and strategies to promote IT&IP’s products and services to the campus community. Communicates directly to IT&IP staff and faculty and staff outside of IT&IP, such as university management and public relations media colleagues, identifying the needs and interests of constituent groups and selecting the best medium to achieve goals within given deadlines. In collaboration with the Web Development team, designs, develops and maintains the IT&IP Division website, including working with division leadership or designeesProvides resources and assistance to the division and departments on the correct use of the University, Division, and department logos, fonts, and other graphic elements, as appropriate, on website pages and marketing materials. Interviews technical personnel to obtain information for how-to articles as well as communicates directly with the Cal Poly Pomona Service Desk staff members and other IT&IP staff regarding revisions. Communicates directly to IT&IP staff and faculty and staff outside of IT&IP, such as university management and public relations media colleagues, identifying the needs and interests of constituent groups. titulo_empleo: Course Outline Writer - Immediate Start
descripcion_empleo:
We are searching for a confident Course Outline Writer to join our productive team at George Brown College in Azuay.Growing your career as a Full Time Course Outline Writer is a great opportunity to develop exceptional skills.If you are strong in project management, presentation and have the right experience for the job, then apply for the position of Course Outline Writer at George Brown College today!What responsibilities will you have in this role?Reviews and edits faculty course outlines in consultation with program coordinators, ensuring compliance with relevant college policies and procedures, grammatical and language conventions and alignment between assessments, course content and course description.Publishes coordinator-approved revisions via the Course Outline Mapping and Management System (COMMS) for the Chair’s final approval.Prepares course outline tracking spreadsheet every semester to remain organized throughout the course outline revision, publishing, and approval process; use the Academic Interface (AI) Database to populate spreadsheet with course offerings, faculty teaching assignments and scheduling information.Distributes course outlines for faculty review semesterly; communicating deadlines, procedures and required revisions clearly and concisely.Updates and maintains database of historical outlines.Follows up with faculty to ensure outlines are submitted for departmental review and approval within designated deadlines.Performs other related duties as assigned.What qualifications do you need for this role?Three-year diploma or degree from a post-secondary institution in English, Communication, Education or equivalent.Minimum two-year experience in a post-secondary institution.Knowledge of Microsoft Office Programs (Excel, Word and Outlook).Ability to use COMMS (Course Outline Mapping Management System) and AI (Academic Interface) or similar Information Management System.Ability to interpret and apply Bloom’s taxonomy to the development and revision of course outlines.Experience in learning new software applications.Ability to set work priorities, establish and meet internal and external deadlines.Demonstrated customer-service orientation with commitment to establishing and maintaining rapport with faculty, supervisor and colleagues.Strong oral and written English communication skills.Ability to interpret and apply College Policy information while adhering to established protocols.Demonstrated ability to provide clear, concise information and advice to faculty in ways that respects diverse backgrounds and experiences.Ability to work independently and collaboratively.Strong organizational skills; high attention to detail and accuracy.Demonstrated commitment in delivering excellent service to others as this is key in supporting the success of our students and our College.Interview process may consist of a practical skills component.NOTES:If employed currently or previously employed at GBC, please log into Cornerstone with your employee account.Please ensure your resume highlights all relevant education, training and experience that are applicable to the minimum qualifications for this role.The College requires proof of degrees, credentials or equivalencies from accredited regional or federal post-secondary institutions and/or their international equivalents. Credentials may require validation at the time of interviews.First consideration will be provided to regular part time (RPT) support staff in accordance with the part time Support Staff Collective Agreement.Closing: January 06, 2023George Brown College is committed to accommodating applicants with disabilities throughout the hiring process, in accordance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA). The Human Resources representative responsible for the recruitment for this position will work with applicants requesting accommodation at any stage of the hiring process.Candidates who require accommodation in the interview process may contact ****** and all information received will be addressed confidentially.As a unionized workplace, we support our internal employees by providing first consideration to qualified applications as set out in the Collective Agreement.For information on George Brown College, please visit our website at . .ErrorMessage { color: Red; } .inlineBlock { display: inline-block } Send to a Friend 1)) && !window.MSStream; if (isIOS) { document.querySelector('.careerSiteHeader').removeAttribute('aria-hidden'); document.querySelector('.careerSiteFooter').removeAttribute('aria-hidden'); document.querySelector('(data-tag= 'dlgChangeLanguage ')').removeAttribute('aria-hidden'); var siblings = document.querySelector('.careerSite').children; for (var i = 0; i ( siblings.length; i++) { siblings(i).removeAttribute('aria-hidden'); }; }document.getElementsByTagName('body')(0).classList.remove('is-dialog-open'); return false;( Please wait...Email this Job Ad to your friend(s) by adding their email address(es) along with your details to the field below:*Separate each recipient email address with a comma.Recipient email address(es):*Your First Name:*Your Last Name:*Select which language the email should be sent in.Language: * Send This Job Opening is already listed as one of your Interests. Objetivo: Investigar, determinar, examinar y evaluar la demanda de la marca y del servicio, a fines de desarrollar campañas y estrategias de publicidad atendiendo las particularidades del público objetivo, a fin de establecer y conservar su imagen de la marca, manteniendo la visión y valores de la empresa. titulo_empleo: Consultor Técnico Comercial Jr.. - Immediate Start
descripcion_empleo: We are on the lookout for a driven Consultor Técnico Comercial Jr.. to join our dynamic team at Confidencial in Durán, Durán (cantone).Growing your career as a Full Time Consultor Técnico Comercial Jr.. is a fantastic opportunity to develop useful skills.If you are strong in teamwork, cooperation and have the right experience for the job, then apply for the position of Consultor Técnico Comercial Jr.. at Confidencial today!Importante empresa multinacional dedicada a la Nutrición, se encuentra en la búsqueda de un CONSULTOR TÉCNICO COMERCIAL JR INDISPENSABLE TENER FORMACIÓN ACADÉMICA COMO MÉDICO VETERINARIO ZOOTECNISTA Experiencia y conocimiento: seis meses o más en gestión técnica y administrativa de granjas en cargos similares, conocimiento orientado al manejo y administración de negocios y proyectos, formulación, nutrición y zootecnia. Disponibidad para viajar y para entrenarse por seis meses en la costa y en la sierra. Funciones: - Asesorar y contribuir en la mejora de los procesos productivos en las granjas de los clientes. - Planear y ejecutar las capacitaciones técnicas al personal de granjas y al personal comercial. - Preparar, analizar y consolidar la información técnica de los clientes. - Dar asesoría técnica nutricional y manejar la formulación. - Programar y ejecutar el proceso de ventas de la zona asignada. - Cumplir las políticas de cartera de los productos comercializados. - Investigar y examinar permanentemente el mercado asignado y potencial. - Responder por el estado de pérdidas y ganancias (P y G) de la zona asignada. - Responder por la cartera de la zona. - Administrar y controlar los gastos de la zona asignada. - Ejecutar la gestión técnica como despliegue de la propuesta de valor de operación país. - Administrar proyectos y negocios, generando y presentando informes de resultados. Benefits of working as a Consultor Técnico Comercial Jr.. in Durán, Durán (cantone):● Learning opportunities● Opportunities to grow● Advantageous package

titulo_empleo: Comunicador/a - Licenciado /a en Comunicación - Relacionador/a Público. - Get Hired Fast
descripcion_empleo: We are looking to hire a driven Comunicador/a - Licenciado /a en Comunicación - Relacionador/a Público. to join our amazing team at Iván Gárate in Cuenca, Cuenca (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Comunicador/a - Licenciado /a en Comunicación - Relacionador/a Público. is a terrific opportunity to develop excellent skills.If you are strong in critical thinking, communication and have the right drive for the job, then apply for the position of Comunicador/a - Licenciado /a en Comunicación - Relacionador/a Público. at Iván Gárate today!1. Asesorar a los usuarios internos y externos sobre los servicios académicos que brinda la institución 2. Coordinar eventos administrativos y académicos institucionales con usuarios internos, externos y proveedores. 3. Llevar un registro pormenorizado y detallado de las actividades realizadas en el cumplimiento de sus funciones y responsabilidades. 4. Administrar los canales de comunicación con el personal académico, administrativo, estudiantes y público en general. 5. Promocionar la oferta académica y eventos educativos del instituto, en organizaciones externas. 6. Coordinar actividades de publicidad con proveedores externos para llevar a cabo eventos publicitarios, académicos, sociales, administrativos, etc. 7. Atender inquietudes de estudiantes y público en general, y remitirlos a quien corresponda para su pronta y adecuada solución 8. Registrar y administrar en medios físicos y/o digitales los eventos de promoción, publicitarios, administrativos, académicos y sociales de la institución. 9. Redactar el contenido a publicarse en los medios impresos y digitales, internos y externos. 1 0. Remitir semestralmente un informe de gestión a la Dirección Administrativa Financiera, a fin de que resuelva lo que corresponda; o cuando lo requieran las instancias jerárquicas superiores. Benefits of working as a Comunicador/a - Licenciado /a en Comunicación - Relacionador/a Público. in Cuenca, Cuenca (canton):● Excellent benefits● Advancement opportunities● Advantageous package

descripcion_empleo: We are hiring an experienced Suscriptor Comercial Seguros Sucursal Portoviejo. to join our stellar team at INTEROCEANICA COMPAÑÍA ANÓNIMA DE SEGUROS in Portoviejo, Portoviejo (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Suscriptor Comercial Seguros Sucursal Portoviejo. is a fantastic opportunity to develop exceptional skills.If you are strong in persuasion, project management and have the right mindset for the job, then apply for the position of Suscriptor Comercial Seguros Sucursal Portoviejo. at INTEROCEANICA COMPAÑÍA ANÓNIMA DE SEGUROS today!Importante empresa de seguros a nivel nacional busca integrar a su equipo de trabajo una(a) Suscriptor Comercial de Cuentas Públicas, Ramos Generales y Fianzas en nuestra sucursal de Portoviejo. Misión: Manejo comercial para mantener y generar nuevos negocios en ramos generales y fianzas, mediante el cumplimiento de políticas y procedimientos para alcanzar el presupuesto de la sucursal. Requisitos: - Estudios universitarios finalizados en Administración de Empresas, Contabilidad, Finanzas o Marketing. - Indispensable Experiencia mínima de 2 años manejando el ramo de cuentas públicas, fianzas y generales. - Enfocada al logro de resultados, negociación y habilidades comerciales desarrolladas. - Excelente presencia y relaciones comerciales con clientes directos, contratistas y/o Asesores de Seguros ( Brokers)- Atención y servicio al cliente, comunicación asertiva, manejo de relaciones de negocio, capacidad de adaptación y cumplimiento de metas. Funciones Principales: - Generar nuevos negocios, bases de datos y fidelización de clientes antiguos. - Elaborar cotizaciones, envío de renovaciones y mantenimiento de cuentas. - Realizar análisis de viabilidad de los clientes para la calificación en la Compañía. - Realizar atención personal y telefónica a clientes, brokers y asegurados. - Elaborar cuadros e informes de producción. titulo_empleo: DATA/BI ANALYST - with Growth Opportunities
descripcion_empleo:
We are looking to hire a creative DATA/BI ANALYST to join our dynamic team at KOISRA Co., Ltd in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time DATA/BI ANALYST is a great opportunity to develop competitive skills.If you are strong in leadership, persuasion and have the right mindset for the job, then apply for the position of DATA/BI ANALYST at KOISRA Co., Ltd today! About the Client:
 The client is a venture capital firm that provides early-stage and growth equity investments, backing innovative technology companies such as Airbnb, ClassPass, HubSpot, KAYAK, and Warby Parker.  Restrictions  Telecommuting is OK  Agencies are OK  Requirements  Requirements:  SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:  Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or similar disciplines; 3+ years of experience as a BI engineer, data analyst, or similar role; 3+ years of experience in BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, Sisense, or QuickSight; 1+ years of experience in programming languages used for data analysis and automation (Preferably Python); Strong SQL experience; Previous experience with data warehouses and/or data lakes. RESPONSIBILITIES:  Build reporting dashboards using BI tools such as Power BI, Google Data Studio, Sisense, or Tableau on top of the data warehouses and/or data lake solutions; Learn and understand data resources and prepare them for analytical usage; Work closely with users and data engineers to understand data flows and provide data/analysis for better decision-making; Design and develop analytical automated processes for large-scale data analysis; Understand and write high-quality and efficient queries to retrieve and analyze data; Define analytical approaches and metrics strategy to uncover new insights and formulate recommendations that improve productivity; Work with Data Engineers to assure data consistency and accuracy; Work closely with Solution Architect, Product Owner, and users to understand customer needs and provide solutions. ABOUT THE PROJECT  The client currently runs the fund using Salesforce as the master data repository and Google Drive for document storage. Different departments use multiple siloed systems for data management, ranging from Excel to external commercial tools to custom-built user-facing apps.  The major Problem with that is the suboptimal time to make the final decision. Analysts can’t rely on the existing data due to possible human errors and complicated data management. That is why even simple reports preparation becomes a time-consuming burden requiring manual operations to make data reporting-ready.  The Solution to those problems is to build a unified data platform that will be integrated with Salesforce and other existing systems to efficiently transform financial, legal, and ops data to datamarts ready for interaction and comprehensive visualization with BI tools on Web and Mobile platforms.  Leveraging the GC comprehensive data pool will supercharge the reporting and decision-making with elegant and functional BI dashboards for all business users, and provide a lasting competitive advantage through technology.  Contact Info  E-mail contact  :  Ver el correo electrónico en codingjobboard.com  Web  : Benefits of working as a DATA/BI ANALYST in Teletrabajo:● Company offers great benefits ● Opportunities to grow● Advantageous package● Remote Work opportunity

titulo_empleo: IT CUSTOMER CARE-REMOTE - Urgent Position
descripcion_empleo: We are looking to hire an expert IT CUSTOMER CARE-REMOTE to join our growing team at Toolbox OTT in Ecuador.Growing your career as a Full Time IT CUSTOMER CARE-REMOTE is a fantastic opportunity to develop competitive skills.If you are strong in planning, leadership and have the right drive for the job, then apply for the position of IT CUSTOMER CARE-REMOTE at Toolbox OTT today! About Toolbox  Toolbox is a Technology company founded in 2013. Our Vision is to Become the fastest Technology Solutions Provider across industries and our Mission is to “Act as the key business partner across industries by enabling the generation of new profitable business through the use of our unique know how to develop technology”. We deliver SPEED.  Our current successes are in the online TV industry. We provide a wide range of products covering User Authentication & Authorization Services, Content Aggregation & Distribution and App Development for End Users, aimed to Content Providers and Multiple Services Operators.  We are a product company, our goal is to guide and accompany market development, building solutions which can be leveraged by as many clients as possible. Our products are used by hundreds of Content Providers and Service Operators in the five continents: WARNER MEDIA, NBC UNIVERSAL, SONY, ATRESMEDIA, PARAMOUNT, DIRECTV among them. 90% of internet traffic related to Online TV in Latin America goes through Toolbox.  What are we looking for? We are looking for exceptional candidates to support our clients through a combination of strong implementation skills, technical know-how and analytical abilities. The Sr It Customer Care is responsible for successful implementation and supporting. Toolbox’s SaaS solutions and products.  In this position, you will be a member of a collaborative team committed to developing proactive, highly effective ongoing relationships with our partners, internal and external clients across the world.  We need candidates willing to work in the following work schedules:  Saturday 8 PM to Sunday 8 AM (GMT-3) Sunday 8 PM to Monday 8 AM (GMT-3)                                OR  Saturday 8 AM to Saturday 20PM (GMT-3) Sunday 8 AM to Sunday 20PM (GMT-3) Duties and Responsibilities:  Provide first line response for customers requiring assistance with information technology issues and problems.  Perform remote software implementations, and provide follow-up product support via telephone, email, and web-based contact channels.  Deliver professional and timely client communications regarding updates, ongoing support items, and product implementation services.  Thoroughly track, organize and document all product support related activities.  Be part of a collaborative effort to improve the team’s performance indicators (KPIs/Dashboards), through data collection and reports.  Develop and maintain a full understanding of Toolbox products and services and stay abreast of relevant industry trends and best practices  Manage issues to resolution, updating the helpdesk system and communicating with relevant parties and managers.  Monitor/Maintain system alerts and escalate errors.  Quickly and accurately determine incident scope and impact of assigned tickets.  Follow up on tickets at predefined intervals until resolved.  Perform other duties as assigned.  Required Skills:  Technical knowledge:  Basic or intermediate handling of APIs: Methods: GET, POST, etc.  Swagger Management: Management of inquiries to internal and external services (clients) Knowledge about 'Front-End' and 'Backend' concepts  Understanding Video Player and Video Streaming  Understanding of Networking, DRM, Encoding and CDN is a plus  Mandatory:  Intermediate or Advanced knowledge in at least 1 of the 5 points.  Excellent written and verbal communication skills; in Spanish and English (essential condition)  Plus:  Advanced knowledge in 2 or more points  Support the client through user acceptance testing, mock implementations, go-live and post go-live including tracking and ensuring correction of any defects found.   What will you get from us? We know that extraordinary people do not choose their jobs based only on the benefits, but we make a great effort to make sure that each of us who are part of Toolbox can achieve success and improve every day.  About the Team  Besides hiring the best tales, we believe diversity in terms of perspectives, ideas and cultures helps creating the best products and solutions. At Toolbox we work with cutting edge technology to build robust, high availability systems, able to handle high load and concurrency. We look for people bringing fresh ideas from the high concurrency system design, non-structured data organization, distributed computing, API design and Mobile areas.  As a member of the Development team, you will work in a project critical to our success, with the chance to switch products as our portfolio evolves. We need versatile people, who enjoy challenges at every stage of the development cycle, who push the envelope and make things happen.  Toolbox will always be a technology company. We hire people throughout the technical spectrum, who impact the life of millions of people through their work. Benefits of working as a IT CUSTOMER CARE-REMOTE in Ecuador:● Learning opportunities● Company offers career progression opportunities● Competitive salary

titulo_empleo: Director, Server Engineering - with Growth Opportunities
descripcion_empleo:
We are looking to hire an organized Director, Server Engineering to join our amazing team at Andiamo Group in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Director, Server Engineering is an amazing opportunity to develop competitive skills.If you are strong in planning, creativity and have the right personality for the job, then apply for the position of Director, Server Engineering at Andiamo Group today! Marco Polo is a video chat app created for one simple and significant purpose—to help people feel close.
 We're currently seeking a Director of Server Engineering to lead our Server and DevOps engineers in building and maintaining world-class products that help people feel close. A great candidate for this role is a strong people manager who has experience leading embedded teams of engineers and excels planning, prioritizing, and managing costs. They will be responsible for running our live service, ensuring our code base and security is solid, and making sure that we have strong operational practices that enable these embedded engineers to maximize their impact. This is a manager-doer role: 75% of of the time will be managing individuals and the larger team; 25% will be individual contributor work.  In this position, you will: -Own the technical roadmap for our live service: You will be responsible for leading our efforts to maintain and improve our live service. You’ll proactively identify, prioritize and address risks, vulnerabilities and limits in our system before they lead to large-scale issues. You’ll work with the leadership team to define and execute a roadmap for the team that enables us to deliver our larger company goals. -Facilitate appropriate staffing across company efforts:You’ll work with partners across the business to coordinate server work and ensure our platform is operating at maximum velocity. You’ll build strong communication channels with these key stakeholders, ensuring you understand their needs and can evolve our platforms to address them. You’ll prioritize the work, making well-informed decisions and tradeoffs. -Provide People Leadership: You’ll build, inspire and manage a talented set of engineers who are embedded on other teams. You’ll coach and empower the team to consistently deliver on the most important projects to meet the needs of the business across the company, on time and with high quality. You will constantly seek opportunities to help uplevel our technical excellence in this area.  Restrictions  Telecommuting is OK  No Agencies Please  Requirements  Ideally, you have: -7+ years of software development experience -2 + years of people management or similar leadership experience -Experience working in a matrixed environment, ideally in an earlier stage company. -Experience with Python, cloud providers and the solution designs that are built around these technologies (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, etc.) -A passion for people management. You love empowering and developing team members. You have a strong track record of creating team cohesion to enable the team to achieve great things. -The ability to work in a fast-paced, constantly learning environment. -A strong track record in finding pragmatic solutions to complex technical or organizational challenges.  About the Company  Marco Polo is private video chat for your real relationships - not the entire world. Our video chat app allows you to send a video message at your convenience, and your friend or family member can send back whenever they can. With millions of people already benefiting from this new way of using technology to nurture their relationships, we’re proving that we can reject harmful but profitable business practices and build products that are good for you.  In June 2020, we launched Marco Polo Plus, a subscription plan that offers a premium experience. We aim to be a sustainable business while remaining free in a way that upholds our brand promise to be good for you. Plus delivers on our promise to monetize without ads or selling user data.  Though our backgrounds are diverse, we share a belief—lives flourish when people feel close. That common inspiration keeps us aligned with our purpose as a team, which is scattered across 16 states (so far), coast-to-coast throughout North America.  The distance doesn't slow us down. We keep the engine humming from our homes, co-working spaces, and coffee shops—connecting with daily Zoom calls, and retreats. Whether collaborating through Slack, video calls, or of course Marco Polo, our team knows how to keep connected—it’s what we do best! We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We can add teammates from anywhere in North America.  Contact Info  Contact  : Emily Hwahn  E-mail contact  :  Ver el correo electrónico en codingjobboard.com  Web  : Benefits of working as a Director, Server Engineering in Teletrabajo:● Learning opportunities● Opportunities to grow● Attractive package● Remote Work opportunity

titulo_empleo: Jefe de Inteligencia de Mercado Almenos 3 años de experiencia en farmacéutico. - Urgent Role
descripcion_empleo: We are looking for an experienced Jefe de Inteligencia de Mercado Almenos 3 años de experiencia en farmacéutico. to join our passionate team at BMC DEL ECUADOR in Quito, Quito (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Jefe de Inteligencia de Mercado Almenos 3 años de experiencia en farmacéutico. is an amazing opportunity to develop exceptional skills.If you are strong in leadership, adaptability and have the right personality for the job, then apply for the position of Jefe de Inteligencia de Mercado Almenos 3 años de experiencia en farmacéutico. at BMC DEL ECUADOR today!LO QUE ESPERAMOS DE TI: - Estudios universitarios en áreas comerciales, marketing, negocios y/o afines. - Experiencia en el área farmacéutica de mínimo 3 años, en áreas comerciales o puestos similares. - Indispensable que tengas experiencia en la venta a cadenas de farmacias y/o supermercados y de preferencia experiencia en compras públicas. - Orientación a negocios, capacidad analítica, resolución de problemas, proactividad, negociación, trabajo en equipo, resolución de conflictos, disponibilidad para viajar 5-6 semanas al año. - Manejo de Office, sistemas para elaboración de reportes y estadísticas, buen manejo de la lengua inglés. TE OFRECEMOS: - Flexibilidad de horario ya que el trabajo es 50% remoto y 50 % visitas a clientes. Trabajo presencial en oficina será esporádico o por reuniones específicas. - Sueldo 1200usd + bono anual por superación de metas. CUÁLES SERÁN TUS RETOS:: oPlanificar, implementar y controlar las estrategias para el desarrollo comercial, operativo y de gestión de personal. oAl ser un trabajo remoto, es importante la elaboración de informes semanales, estadísticas, proyecciones, análisis de ventas, auditoría de prescripciones, entre otros, para la gerencia. oPlanificar, coordinar, diseñar y entregar los reportes consolidados de resultados de ventas, prescripciones y coberturas para determinar junto con los jefes de área las estrategias de ventas o de marketing para alcanzar las metas propuestas (mensuales). oAnálisis y mejora de la imagen y promoción de los productos existentes y la búsqueda de nuevos nichos de mercado o líneas de producto. oRecopilar datos de inteligencia de negocios de los informes disponibles de la industria, información pública, informes de campo o fuentes compradas. oIdentificar o monitorear clientes actuales y potenciales, utilizando herramientas de inteligencia de negocios. oAnalizar las estrategias de mercado competitivas a través del estudio de las tendencias relacionadas con el producto, los clientes o el mercado. oAnalizar las tendencias tecnológicas para identificar mercados para el futuro desarrollo de productos o para mejorar las ventas de productos existentes. oGenerar informes estándar o personalizados que resuman los datos empresariales, financieros o económicos para su revisión por ejecutivos y gerentes. oPara solicitar esta posición, envíe una carta de motivación junto con su CV. oNo se revisarán solicitudes que no tengan los dos requisitos adjuntos en formato PDF. Benefits of working as a Jefe de Inteligencia de Mercado Almenos 3 años de experiencia en farmacéutico. in Quito, Quito (canton):● Excellent benefits● Opportunities to grow● Competitive salary

titulo_empleo: Lead Engineer - Urgent Role
descripcion_empleo:
We are hiring an experienced Lead Engineer to join our vibrant team at TALENGER in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Lead Engineer is a terrific opportunity to develop excellent skills.If you are strong in presentation, communication and have the right mindset for the job, then apply for the position of Lead Engineer at TALENGER today! We are looking for a Technical Lead who will help us scale the infrastructure and the engineering team. You will be working very closely with Jan and Triin, our Product Managers, and Alari, our CEO, as well as our engineering team of 7 and growth engineering team of 2.
  Technology requirements:  You need to have experience working with large SaaS data infrastructure:  Technical design and architecture  Performance improvements  Security and scalability  Technical decisions and strategy.  You still need to be able to get your hands dirty and write a code if needed, do a code review or research & implement new tools.  Our current tech stack is made of Golang, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, Typescript, GraphQL, Heroku, AWS, CircleCI.   Leadership requirements:  Grow our engineering team  Help hiring, onboarding and motivating the team  Coaching and technical mentorship of our engineers  Be the technical go-to person for everybody in the company  Help crafting the technical strategy to help achieving the business goals and the company growth.   Join the Toggl Hire engineering team  You will fit in well in our team if you are a good team player and communicator, cooperative and always approach new challenges with a critical thinking mindset. You love collaborating with people from all disciplines and make sure to look at the big picture. You will succeed in our team if you want to take ownership of your work and operate well autonomously while being part of a tight-knit team. Efficient time management as well as eagerness to learn new skills and tools are something you value.  Remote work and traveling ring your bell. A culture of freedom and flexibility makes you motivated and productive. Sound like you? Then, you'll fit right in! You need to be based in Europe.  The salary is EUR 75,000 annually plus benefits listed below.   About the team  Toggl Hire is on a mission to revolutionize the way hiring happens. We are big believers that modern day recruiting should be effortless and enjoyable. That means no more resumes or cover letters, no more endless hours screening through applications, no more interpreting past roles into current experience, no more bias and gut feeling, but informed decisions based on data.  We are a fully remote team, with headquarters in Tallinn, Estonia. We are highly skilled, highly motivated, and most importantly, a fun, friendly bunch. We value transparency and communication, and have regular meetups all over the world! How to apply and hiring process  Take a ~20-minute online skills test—no CVs or cover letters needed. If you’re still reading, just go ahead and give it a go!  After that if all goes well:  A short take-home assignment  Call with Jan, our Product Lead  Paid test week with Toggl Hire engineering team  Final call with Alari, our CEO  Offer   Some benefits  Freedom to choose when and where you work from. 24 days of paid time off a year, plus your local holidays.  Several team meetups a year (expenses covered) for team-building.  Laptop and a €2,000 budget to set up your home office.  Reimbursement for co-working space rent or internet service at home.  Opportunities to attend trainings, workshops or conferences. €2,000 budget for gym membership, massage and other things to improve your health.  Support for buying eyeglasses or tools you need for doing your best work. Benefits of working as a Lead Engineer in Teletrabajo:● Company offers great benefits ● Opportunities to grow● Competitive salary● Remote Work opportunity

descripcion_empleo: We are searching for a driven Técnico en Prevención de Riesgos Laborales. to join our diverse team at HILLARY RESORT in Arenillas, Arenillas (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Técnico en Prevención de Riesgos Laborales. is an incredible opportunity to develop excellent skills.If you are strong in adaptability, project management and have the right drive for the job, then apply for the position of Técnico en Prevención de Riesgos Laborales. at HILLARY RESORT today!PERFIL: Estado Civil: Indistinto Reporte Directo: Gerente General Ubicación del puesto de trabajo: Provincia de El Oro (Ecuador), Arenillas OBJETIVOS DEL CARGO: Asesorar técnicamente a la organización en materias de prevención de riesgos propias del ejercicio de las labores tanto operativas como profesionales, además de diseñar, ejecutar y difundir acciones permanentes de capacitación en la empresa. FORMACIÓN ACADÉMICA: Tercer Nivel en Prevención de Riesgos laborales o 4 nivel en prevención de riesgos con 3 nivel en carreras afines a la actividades de la empresa Ing. Industrial, Ing Mecánica, Ing Civil, Ing Química, Hotelería y Turismo, Ing en Alimentos, afines). EXPERIENCIA LABORAL: Dos años de experiencia en empresas de más de 100 trabajadores. CONOCIMIENTOS ADICIONALES REQUERIDOS: - Conocimiento de manejo de software utilitario. - Manejo de indicadores de un sistema integrado de gestión de Seguridad. - Normativa de seguridad y salud en el trabajo. - Control y monitoreo de Riesgos. - Normativa legal vigente. - Modelo de Gestión del IESS. - Prevención de Riesgos Laborales. - Técnicas de Seguridad y Salud Ocupacional. FUNCIONES: - Definir, establecer y gestionar las directrices estratégicas, técnicas y operativas en el ámbito de seguridad, salud en el trabajo, en el marco del control de factores de riesgos que generen o puedan generar la ocurrencia de accidentes del trabajo y enfermedades profesionales a los trabajadores de la empresa. - Elaborar, Planificar, Gestionar y controlar la ejecución del plan anual de prevención de riesgos laborales. - Supervisar la elaboración de procesos preventivos en la empresa. - Promover la innovación y desarrollo de nuevas acciones que optimicen los resultados preventivos en su equipo de trabajo. - Realizar la identificación, medición y evaluación de riesgos. - Realizar el control de riesgos profesionales; así como también la promoción y adiestramiento de los trabajadores. - Realizar el registro de la accidentabilidad, ausentismo y evaluación estadística de los resultados. - Realizar el asesoramiento técnico, en materia de control de incendios, almacenamiento adecuado, protección de maquinarias, instalaciones eléctricas, primeros auxilios, control y educación sanitaria, ventilación, protección personal. - Colaborar en la prevención de riesgos que efectúen los organismos del sector público. - Mantener actualizados los archivos con documentos técnicos de higiene y seguridad como son: - Diseñar procedimientos y formatos de inspecciones seguras. - Realizar la inducción-evaluación, capacitación-evaluación y entrenamiento a los colaboradores de la organización en materia de seguridad. - Realizar las charlas, capacitaciones, adiestramientos, etc., al personal en prevención de riesgos laborales y programar las mismas. - Realizar la actualización de la matriz de evaluación de riesgos laborales por puestos de trabajo. - Elaborar informes periódicos de las actividades realizadas en materia de seguridad y prevención al Gerente General. - Realizar la evaluación en conjunto con el Médico de Salud ocupacional de los riesgos psicosociales al personal de la organización. - Monitorear el plan de acción de la intervención de riesgo psicosocial con los departamentos involucrados. - Realizar la investigación de accidentes ?in itinere? y accidentes de trabajo para determina su causa. - Elaborar todos los formatos de reportes e investigación de accidentes; se realizará en forma efectiva y adaptada a la estructura de la organización, el formato de investigación de accidentes de la gestión legal de Seguridad y Salud Ocupacional del Ecuador (Resolución N° 513). - Diseñar y recomendar los equipos de protección personal normalizados, para ser utilizados en función del riesgo; se efectuarán controles mediante formatos. - Realizar cualquier otra tarea afín que le sea asignada. COMPETENCIAS: - Orientación al servicio - Trabajo en equipo - Integridad - Pensamiento analítico - Monitoreo y control. - Capacidad de Planificación. - Orientación al logro. - Desarrollo de personas. REMUNERACIÓN: Contrato Turístico por 6 meses (incluye periodo a prueba de 90 días); y posteriormente el contrato se renueva por 6 meses más. Sueldo acorde al cargo y Beneficios de ley. 10% de Servicio. FAVOR SOLO APLICAR ASPIRANTES QUE CUMPLAN 100% CON EL PERFIL Benefits of working as a Técnico en Prevención de Riesgos Laborales. in Arenillas, Arenillas (canton):● Learning opportunities● Company offers career progression opportunities● Advantageous package

titulo_empleo: Senior Salesforce Administrator - Remote - Latin America
descripcion_empleo: FullStack Labs is the fastest-growing software consultancy in the Americas. We help organizations like Uber, GoDaddy, MGM, Siemens, Stanford University, and the State of California, build distributed software development teams, and deliver transformational digital solutions. As an employee-first company, we focus on hiring the most talented software designers and developers in the western hemisphere, by creating a positive, respectful, and supportive work environment where they can achieve their greatest potential.We’re most proud of:*Offering life-changing career opportunities to talented software professionals across the Americas.*Building highly-skilled software development teams for hundreds of the world’s greatest companies.*Having delivered hundreds of successful custom software solutions, which have positively impacted the lives and careers of millions of users.*Our rating on GlassDoor.*Our client Net Promoter Score of 64, twice the industry average.*Sustained growth of 100% - 200% per year.The Position:We're looking to hire several Senior Salesforce Administrators to join our team. You'll work with our incredible clients in one of two ways: Team Augmentation / Staffing: You will integrate yourself directly into our client's team and work alongside their existing designers and engineers on a daily basis.Design & Build: You will work on a FullStack Labs product team to build and deliver a product to our clients.What We're Looking For:5+ years of professional software development experience. 5+ years preferred but not required.Advanced English is required.Meaningful experience working as a Salesforce Administrator.Experience working on large, complex systems.Experience working on Agile / Scrum teams.A four-year college degree is required.Ability to take extreme ownership over your work. Every day is a challenge to ensure you are performing to the expectations you and your team have agreed upon.Ability to identify with the goals of FullStack's clients, and dedicate yourself to delivering on the commitments you and your team make to them.An understanding of best practices and a commitment to following them.Ability to work through new and difficult issues and contribute to libraries as needed.A positive mindset and can-do attitude.Forensic attention to detail.You’re passionate about software development...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current.Ability to consistently work 40 hours per week.Benefits:Competitive pay in your local currency.100% remote work.The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies.English Classes.Virtual company events each month.Ample opportunity for career advancement.Continuing education opportunities.Depending on your location other benefits may apply. FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process. Learn more about our .
