titulo_empleo: Senior Frontend Engineer - Urgent Role
descripcion_empleo: We are searching for a competitive Senior Frontend Engineer to join our productive team at Andiamo Group in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Senior Frontend Engineer is an amazing opportunity to develop relevant skills.If you are strong in critical thinking, leadership and have the right personality for the job, then apply for the position of Senior Frontend Engineer at Andiamo Group today! How you will make an impact  As our  Senior  Frontend Engineer, you will be working on building an exceptional user experience for the thousands of customers that interact with our product daily. With our product's constant growth and evolution, you will be exposed to interesting challenges as we develop new features, improvements, and changes in our architecture.   Some of your tasks and responsibilities include:  Collaborating closely within an autonomous, cross-functional team, solving exciting challenges and planning continuous improvements.  Designing and implementing scalable and performant solutions.  Participating in the development and adoption of our UI component library.  Making architectural decisions and recommendations for creating a best-in-class user experience.  Participating as part of internal Engineering Guilds, to identify architectural improvements, and prioritize and act on them.  Bringing creative ideas and expertise to the table, having a real impact on our product and engineering practices.  Working in an environment that supports your growth.   Expectations timeline 1 Month  You have gone through different onboarding sessions covering our product, current architecture, and relevant services we run on production learned about the company's origin and current vision and met colleagues from different departments as part of onboarding as well as weekly virtual social events.  You would have started to get to know your teammates, learned how we work daily, and contributed to our codebase.  3 Months  You will be familiar with most concepts related to our product and worked alongside your teammates to deliver features and improvements on production successfully.  You would have had a few 1:1s with your team lead to check in on how things are going, you will have participated in some engineering guild sessions and collaborated with fellow engineers to improve our architecture and developer experience.  6 Months  You will have made solid contributions to our product, influenced our ways of working, shared knowledge, and previous experience helping substantially with important decision-making.   Our tech stack  TypeScript, Node.js, React, Golang, PSQL  GraphQL, REST  Pulumi, AWS, Vercel, Cloudflare, Fastly, New Relic, Github actions   Job requirements  Our expectations from you 6+ years of frontend development experience, preferably with React and TypeScript.  Experience writing testable code, following best practices and design patterns when applicable.  Mindful about performance and able to measure it meaningfully.  Strong expertise in analyzing product requirements and creating technical designs.  Strong collaboration and communication skills, both verbal and written. Ability to take ownership, but also ask for help and advice when needed.  Openness to feedback and willingness to learn, reflect, and grow within the organization  Experience in successfully driving technical, business, and people-related initiatives that improved productivity, performance, and quality.   Bonus points:  Experience working with design systems.  Experience with developing APIs using GraphQL and/or REST.  Experience with monitoring and observability tooling.  Experience with accessibility and tools to measure it.  Experience mentoring other teammates to grow and improve continuously.   The Process  Intro call with our Talent Acquisition Manager.  Interview with Hiring Manager(s) (Case study or assignment or code pairing if applicable).  Team Fit Call.  Reference Check and Offer.   The response time is usually within 2 weeks for each step. You could expect some alterations when necessary.   About us  At  Hygraph we're building the leading GraphQL Federated Content Platform. Our goal is to enable developers and content operators to create, enrich, unify, and deliver content across platforms seamlessly. We are trusted to manage content for teams from over 50,000 organizations like Telenor, Burrow, Gamescom, and Shure. With over $10M in funding from OpenOcean, Peak, and Paua Ventures, you will be part of a remote-first and globally distributed team of over 60 colleagues, committed to working collaboratively, transparently, and passionately.   Working at Hygraph  Our teams are passionate about our product.  Self-motivation, trust, and collaboration is the driving factor for our success.  We believe in a remote-first approach where everyone is encouraged to do their best from wherever they are and work together with transparency, accountability, and ownership.  We have a workstation budget to support the remote work on top of providing the latest company IT equipment (e.g. Macbook).  We are curious, risk-takers, and we experiment with our ideas and make things happen.  We work together to provide optimal solutions for our users and adapt to the people and market needs.  Our flexible working model encourages us to work according to what works best for us and maintain an excellent work-life balance.  We learn continuously through feedback and have a yearly learning budget to attend training and conferences.  We are an international and friendly team spread across 17 countries, coming together once a year for our annual off-site/retreat.   Hygraph is an equal opportunity employer committed to hiring people with diverse backgrounds. We believe that diversity, unique experiences, qualities, and different cultures enrich our workspace's productivity and promote innovation and creativity. titulo_empleo: Senior Cloud Engineer ️ REMOTE position for a clean... - Hiring Urgently
descripcion_empleo: We are on the lookout for a remarkable Senior Cloud Engineer ☁️ REMOTE position for a clean... to join our awesome team at Prometeo Talent in Quito, Quito (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Senior Cloud Engineer ☁️ REMOTE position for a clean... is an incredible opportunity to develop excellent skills.If you are strong in persuasion, presentation and have the right experience for the job, then apply for the position of Senior Cloud Engineer ☁️ REMOTE position for a clean... at Prometeo Talent today! About Us:  At  SparkMeter  our mission is to electrify everything and everyone. We help utilities and governmentsmake the transition to electrification while providing affordable, reliable, clean power.  We don’t care where in the world you are or how big or small you are. We are particularly interested in solving these problems in underserved markets that are served by outdated incumbents.  SparkMeter’s product is a cutting edge  IOT platform  that is used by utility companies around the world to effectively manage electrical grids. Our platform utilizes proprietary metering technology and communication protocols to move data from edge devices to the cloud, where customers utilize our  multi-tenant SaaS application  to manage assets and to gain insight into the status and health of their grids.  SparkMeter is searching for a  Cloud Engineer  to lead the design and maintenance of all  AWS cloud infrastructure  used to support our products. This role will work closely with all areas of engineering to architect, develop, deploy and support cloud-based infrastructure, and to devise roadmaps for evolving our cloud footprint to support our product roadmaps.  This is a 100% remote position  ; however we are  headquartered in Washington D.C  . and have an amazing downtown office that you are welcome to use. The team will also meet there periodically (likely quarterly), so  some limited travel will be required.  What you will be doing:  Be the AWS expert, develop and maintain a deep understanding of AWS capabilities and how to best leverage AWS technology to build high performance, scalable and secure infrastructure. Lead the specification, design and deployment of managed and containerized services needed to support new products.  Work closely with tech leads and product managers to understand requirements for performance, scalability and security.  Design, implement and maintain a virtual cloud network topology.  Develop and manage infrastructure as code solutions needed to automate deployment and maintenance.  Schedule and perform upgrades to services and components.  Manage and track cost and billing, and devise strategies for optimizing use of AWS services.  Work as part of an agile software development team, attend sprint planning, backlog grooming sessions and daily stand-ups.  Provide technical direction, mentoring and delegating tasks to team members.  It can be a perfect match if you have: 3+ years’ experience supporting a large-scale AWS cloud implementation 3+ experience architecting cloud environments to support software products  Experience deploying and managing the following AWS managed services: EC2, ELB, RDS, S3, ECS (Elastic Container Service), Elastic Search, MSK (Kafka), ElastiCache Redis, Route53, VPC, API Gateway,Lambda functions, SNS, CloudWatch  Experience with any type of containerization and orchestration technology Experience with architecting to support application security and security hardening Experience with Python or any programming language  A strong desire to learn and apply new technologies  It can be a plus if you have: Container orchestration using the following tools from HashiCorp (or similar): Nomad, Consul, and Vault  Infrastructure as code using the following tools from HashiCorp (or similar): Terraform and Packer  Linux system administration and shell scripting Experience working in the utility or energy industry  Experience designing, building and supporting infrastructure to support an IOT platform and products Experience scaling a multi-tenant SaaS application  Any big data experience  What we offer:  You will work with customers and team members all over the world  You will have the ability to select and implement new technologies  Competitive salary You can work remotely, with the option to travel to our office in DC for team events  PTO  And more!Benefits of working as a Senior Cloud Engineer ☁️ REMOTE position for a clean... in Quito, Quito (canton):● Excellent benefits● Advancement opportunities● Competitive salary

titulo_empleo: Asesor Comercial (Guayaquil). - Urgent
descripcion_empleo: We are searching for an experienced Asesor Comercial (Guayaquil). to join our growing team at Banco Solidario in Guayaquil, Guayaquil (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Asesor Comercial (Guayaquil). is an awesome opportunity to develop exceptional skills.If you are strong in planning, cooperation and have the right experience for the job, then apply for the position of Asesor Comercial (Guayaquil). at Banco Solidario today!Dicen que los bancos no distinguen personas, que solo ven números, porque son exactos, fríos, no admiten equívocos, no tienen nada que ver con historias o emociones... se dicen muchas cosas de los bancos, pero nunca se ha dicho que son solidarios. Y si te dijéramos que si existe un banco que es Solidario como ningún otro, que cree en el cliente y sus colaboradores por encima de todas las cosas, uno que sabe de finanzas y de personas, pero sobretodo de lucha, de esfuerzo y de sueños. Un banco que, a diferencia de la mayoría, nació con misión social, que cree en la gente por lo que es, más que por lo que tiene; que acompaña a quienes trabajan por un futuro mejor. Un banco que no parece banco, porque se esfuerza por conocer las historias de sus colaboradores y de sus clientes, antes de ofrecerles un producto o un servicio. Un banco que lleva en su ADN el enfoque de Diversidad, Inclusión y Equidad de Género. Un banco que se inspira en el trabajo de las personas para brindar lo mejor de sí. Un banco que jamás cierra su puerta a quien lo necesita, que entendió que sin acceso jamás habrá verdadero progreso y superación. ?.Un banco que realmente es SOLIDARIO CONTIGO. Actualmente nos encontramos en la búsqueda de un ASESOR COMERCIAL - GUAYAQUIL Misión del Cargo: Gestionar los requerimientos de preventa, venta y postventa de los productos asignados, cumpliendo con los estándares de calidad de servicio establecidos a fin de aportar con la gestión del negocio y generar fidelidad de los clientes. Funciones del Cargo: - Promocionar y comercializar los productos y servicios del Banco, de acuerdo a las metas establecidas, para garantizar el cumplimiento del presupuesto establecido.  - Realizar visitas de preventa a potenciales clientes y levantamiento de información para análisis de otorgación de créditos, así como la entrega de Tarjetas de Crédito, con el fin de alcanzar el presupuesto definido.  - Asesorar a los clientes sobre los diferentes productos y servicios del Banco, con la finalidad de ofrecerle una experiencia de adquisición más satisfactoria y acertada, fidelizarlos y cumplir con los objetivos estratégicos del negocio.  - Mantener el porcentaje de provisión establecido de la cartera asignada, para sostener los indicadores de riesgo dentro de los estándares requeridos por el Banco y Organismo de control.  - Cumplir con las políticas de crédito vigentes, y los procesos operativos relacionados con los productos comercializados, para asegurar un adecuado control de riesgos inherentes a la gestión, minimizando así pérdidas.  - Atender y dar seguimiento a reclamos y quejas de clientes, para asegurar el cumplimiento de las normativas externas e internas y cumplir con los tiempos de respuesta establecidos.  - Atender la regularización de las observaciones efectuadas por Auditoría Externa, Auditoría Interna, Organismos de Control y otras instituciones relacionadas, para minimizar riesgos de imagen, operativos y reputacional.  - Conocer, cumplir y hacer cumplir políticas, procesos, procedimientos y controles establecidos, así como lo determinado en la Normativa Externa del Sistema Financiero, el Reglamento Interno de Trabajo y el Código de Conducta Ética. Requisitos:  Formación académica: Mínimo segundo año en Ing. Comercial, Administración de Empresas, Banca y Finanzas, Ing. Marketing o afines. Experiencia: Bancaria mínimo 1 año en cargos de servicio al cliente y comerciales. Beneficios Ofrecemos salario competitivo, comisiones, beneficios corporativos y beneficios de ley. ¡Si cumples con el perfil no pierdas la oportunidad de desarrollar tu talento con nosotros!Benefits of working as a Asesor Comercial (Guayaquil). in Guayaquil, Guayaquil (canton):● Company offers great benefits ● Opportunities to grow● Competitive salary

titulo_empleo: Senior Manager, Student Support & Strategic Integration - Start Immediately
descripcion_empleo:
We are on the lookout for an energetic Senior Manager, Student Support & Strategic Integration to join our awesome team at George Brown College in Azuay.Growing your career as a Full Time Senior Manager, Student Support & Strategic Integration is a great opportunity to develop useful skills.If you are strong in planning, cooperation and have the right mindset for the job, then apply for the position of Senior Manager, Student Support & Strategic Integration at George Brown College today!What responsibilities will you have in this role?Reporting to the Director, Student Engagement and Career Services and working collaboratively with the Sr Managers of Counselling and Student Well-being, and Accessible Learning Services, the Sr Manager, Strategic Integration Student Support Services provides leadership for the student intake, data gathering and analysis, and operational improvement processes across these service areas. The incumbent will also work closely with stakeholders across the College to ensure integration of data collection and that analysis processes are aligned in a manner that promotes student success and well-being.Provides daily and on-going support to service teams around use of data collection and client management systems, including provision of technical support for client management software systems, facilitating technical support from IT personnel at the College and external vendors where necessary.Leads development and implementation of new and existing software systems to optimize data collection and client services.Identifies key performance monitoring and service experience data collection opportunities for service areas, for example: student experience surveys, access surveys, service utilization reports.Produces quantitative and qualitative reports on key performance indicators; analyze data to identify opportunities for service improvements and make recommendations to the Director in this regard.Engages in the strategic planning of service access processes within the service areas, contribute to annual business planning and engage in new initiatives to promote service integration and outcomes, in collaboration with the Director and other service area managers.Develops a health-equity framework for service evaluation and program development across service areas.Works with College partners to enhance student navigation of service access points within Counselling, ALS, Deaf & Hard of Hearing Services and Peer Connect in alignment with strategic review and recommendations – for example, Project RISE.Develops strategic service plan for peer mental health programming and supports; work in collaboration with stakeholders cross-divisionally, including with academic areas, to develop programming and service access supports through peer-based resources.Responsible for budget management, approval and reporting for service areas in alignment with strategic and business planning goals.Represents service areas in external partnerships and collaborations aimed at development and implementation of health-equity, data driven service framework for student service access.Provides daily and on-going supervision to intake and front desk staff in service areas.Supervises peer mental health program coordinators and student staff; provide direction and leadership in development of peer mental health programming.Other related duties as assigned.What qualifications do you need for this role?Masters Degree from a recognized post-secondary institution in a related field (Counselling, Social Work, Disability Studies, Adult Education, Business Administration etc.) is required.Registration in a relevant regulated profession preferred – e.g., OCSWSSW, CRPO.Minimum seven (7) years relevant leadership experience, including demonstrated success in a student services environment. Preferably with direct experience in student affairs, post-secondary mental health, or accessibility services.Formal training on data base/software systems management or equivalent experience is required.Data analysis training or extensive equivalent experience is needed.Experience and/or training in outcome-based program/service planning and evaluation.Excellent communication, facilitation, and collaboration skills with diverse audiences, ranging from students, administration, faculty, and professional service providers.Working knowledge of key aspects of post-secondary student services delivery, with expertise in areas of student mental health and accessibility services.Understanding of principles of anti-oppressive and trauma-informed practice with the ability to enhance equity and inclusive service environments for diverse communities of students, staff, and stakeholders.Experience producing service reports presentations and analyzing statistical and qualitative data.Ability to synthesize data into meaningful reports and recommendations on service usage and trends.Understanding of health-equity frameworks and best practices in inclusive health and well-being services is needed.Possesses a strong student-centered orientation grounded in a strengths-based approach to supporting student engagement and leadership in service development and delivery.Experience providing leadership, coaching, guidance, advice, and support to all levels of management and employees on human resources issues.Leads collaboratively by partnering with others internally and externally to engage multiple stakeholders, foster alignment, gain consensus, and influence outcomes.Demonstrates superior communication in articulating direction and the reasons for it, in problem solving to resolve issues and in managing crisis situations.Strong analytical, coordination, change management and project management skills with ability to prioritize changing and conflicting demands, meet deadlines, and stay productive under pressure.Demonstrated leadership in delivering excellent service to others as this is key in supporting the success of our students and the College.Effective ability to interact with others and deal with situations in ways that respect diverse backgrounds, experience, and styles.Flexibility in adapting to change and in participating in consultative decision-making processes.NOTES:If employed currently or previously employed at GBC, please log into Cornerstone with your employee account.Please ensure your resume highlights all relevant education, training and experience that are applicable to the minimum qualifications for this role.The College requires proof of degrees, credentials or equivalencies from accredited regional or federal post-secondary institutions and/or their international equivalents. Credentials may require validation at the time of interviews.Closing: Open until filled.George Brown College is committed to accommodating applicants with disabilities throughout the hiring process, in accordance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA). The Human Resources representative responsible for the recruitment for this position will work with applicants requesting accommodation at any stage of the hiring process.Candidates who require accommodation in the interview process may contact ****** and all information received will be addressed confidentially.As a unionized workplace, we support our internal employees by providing first consideration to qualified applications as set out in the Collective Agreement.For information on George Brown College, please visit our website at ..ErrorMessage { color: Red; } .inlineBlock { display: inline-block } Send to a Friend 1)) && !window.MSStream; if (isIOS) { document.querySelector('.careerSiteHeader').removeAttribute('aria-hidden'); document.querySelector('.careerSiteFooter').removeAttribute('aria-hidden'); document.querySelector('(data-tag= 'dlgChangeLanguage ')').removeAttribute('aria-hidden'); var siblings = document.querySelector('.careerSite').children; for (var i = 0; i ( siblings.length; i++) { siblings(i).removeAttribute('aria-hidden'); }; }document.getElementsByTagName('body')(0).classList.remove('is-dialog-open'); return false;( Please wait...Email this Job Ad to your friend(s) by adding their email address(es) along with your details to the field below:*Separate each recipient email address with a comma.Recipient email address(es):*Your First Name:*Your Last Name:*Select which language the email should be sent in.Language: * Send This Job Opening is already listed as one of your Interests. You cannot add the same Job Opening to your list of Interests more than one time.To see your list of Interests, navigate to the Application Status tab within My Profile function closeApplyWithDialog() { $find('ctl00_siteContent_applyWithIntegrationsLoginPopup_dlgApplyWithIntegrationAccountWarning_MPE').hide(); } .btnPopup { width: 35px; } .divInstrText { vertical-align: middle; display:block; margin-left: 50px; padding-top: 10px; padding-left: 10px; } .iconWarning { float: left; padding-top: 10px; padding-left: 10px; display:block; margin:auto; text-align:center; } Account Warning Log In Cancel OK function fnCloseJobNotSaved() { $find('ctl00_siteContent_dlgJobNotSaved_MPE').hide(); } api_key: d5rq82veziaa authorize: true Contact Us | Emergency Information | Accessibility | Privacy Policy | Site Map //var Page_ValidationSummaries = new Array(document.getElementById(ctl00_siteContent_ucEmail_dlgEmailJob_vsSummary));var Page_Validators = new Array(document.getElementById(ctl00_siteContent_cvApplyReqs), document.getElementById(ctl00_siteContent_ucEmail_dlgEmailJob_cvRecipient), document.getElementById(ctl00_siteContent_ucEmail_dlgEmailJob_cvReferrerFirstName), document.getElementById(ctl00_siteContent_ucEmail_dlgEmailJob_cvReferrerLastName), document.getElementById(ctl00_siteContent_

titulo_empleo: Marketing Director Consumer - Quito Ecuador - Urgent Hiring
descripcion_empleo: We are hiring a driven Marketing Director Consumer - Quito Ecuador to join our vibrant team at Plusheadhunters Consulting and Training in Quito, Quito (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Marketing Director Consumer - Quito Ecuador is an awesome opportunity to develop competitive skills.If you are strong in adaptability, project management and have the right personality for the job, then apply for the position of Marketing Director Consumer - Quito Ecuador at Plusheadhunters Consulting and Training today! Nuestra firma está buscando un Director de Marketing de Consumo para desarrollar e implementar planes y tácticas para el desarrollo de estrategia, y objetivos del consumidor.  Lugar de trabajo:  Quito, Ecuador.  Modalidad:  75% híbrido o remoto, y 25% viaje.  Descripción del rol:  Como Director de Marketing de Consumo, usted será responsable del desarrollo, implementación y refinamiento de planes y tácticas para una de nuestras líneas. Las áreas clave de énfasis para este rol incluyen el desarrollo de la estrategia, los objetivos y las tácticas del consumidor, incluidos los medios digitales y la televisión, las redes sociales pagadas y orgánicas, la estrategia de comunicación, los programas y sitios web sólidos de apoyo al paciente y un plan de medición del rendimiento.  Esta posición requerirá un liderazgo sobresaliente en muchas áreas, incluido el desarrollo de estrategias, planes y creatividad, medición, construcción de relaciones, colaboración e influencia multifuncional, gestión de agencias y desarrollo de equipos.  Responsabilidades:  Responsable de construir y monitorear la ejecución de la estrategia y el plan del consumidor.  Liderar la planificación y ejecución de medios para la marca.  Liderar la estrategia de comunicación/mensajería del consumidor.  Liderar flujos de trabajo que monitorean el compromiso con los segmentos de consumidores y crean estrategias para una penetración más profunda.  Trabajar con los directores de marca homólogos como un equipo para identificar oportunidades de marca dentro y entre los segmentos de clientes.  Monitorear la dinámica del mercado y el desempeño de la marca para ayudar a informar las recomendaciones de inversión.  Gestionar el desarrollo creativo y los respectivos socios de la agencia.  Asociarse con aspectos regulatorios, médicos, de cumplimiento y legales a través de las fases de desarrollo y aprobación para garantizar que todos los materiales cumplan con los estándares de la FDA y nuestra Marca.  Calificaciones básicas:  BS/BA, 6 años de Marketing o una combinación de marketing y otra experiencia comercial relevante.  Debe poseer experiencia de liderazgo, incluido el desarrollo de colegas junior o miembros del equipo.  Experiencia en gestión de marcas farmacéuticas  Marketing de consumo, incluida la planificación de medios, el desarrollo de campañas, la identificación y aplicación de ideas, el liderazgo de la agencia.  Éxito previo en un entorno fuertemente matricial: ser capaz de liderar la estrategia (del consumidor) mientras se trabaja estrechamente con un equipo de marca más amplio para garantizar que se alinee con un enfoque de marca más amplio.  Capacidad para realizar un seguimiento financiero del rendimiento táctico y tomar decisiones apropiadas basadas en datos.  Calificaciones preferidas:  MBA y 8+ años de marketing u otra experiencia comercial relevante (3+ años en marketing de consumo).  Capacidad para impulsar una experiencia óptima del cliente y el comportamiento previsto del consumidor a través de una comprensión profunda del ecosistema digital.  Experiencia trabajando con equipos de análisis e investigación de mercado para medir e interpretar el rendimiento de la marca e identificar oportunidades.  Experiencia colaborando e influyendo eficazmente en colegas en la organización comercial y en equipos multifuncionales, tanto en persona como de forma remota.  Capacidad para solicitar e incorporar diferentes perspectivas en funciones médicas, clínicas, comerciales, de clientes y otras funciones.  Debe tener fuertes habilidades de comunicación escrita y verbal.  Capacidad para desarrollar múltiples ideas, soluciones y opciones estratégicas novedosas para ofrecer beneficios a largo plazo al cliente y a la Empresa, y posteriormente articular una recomendación respaldada, incluidas las compensaciones.  Experiencia impulsando el análisis de oportunidades de mercado y marca y desarrollando información de marca procesable.  Busca mejorar continuamente uno mismo, los demás, el negocio y la organización.  Ingles avanzado, C2.  Información adicional:  La ubicación de esta posición en Quito, Ecuador.  Esta posición puede requerir un 25 % de viaje.  Salario + Beneficios Adicionales: $90,000-$110,000 + 20% de bonificación  Seguro médico (100% cubierto para empleados) Seguro Dental  Seguro de vida  Seguro de la vista  Send CV to Ver el correo electrónico en careers-page.com Benefits of working as a Marketing Director Consumer - Quito Ecuador in Quito, Quito (canton):● Company offers great benefits ● Opportunities to grow● Attractive package

titulo_empleo: Senior DevOps Engineer - Hiring Urgently
descripcion_empleo:
We are hiring a hardworking Senior DevOps Engineer to join our vibrant team at Kunsh Technologies in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Senior DevOps Engineer is an amazing opportunity to develop exceptional skills.If you are strong in decision-making, communication and have the right drive for the job, then apply for the position of Senior DevOps Engineer at Kunsh Technologies today! Senior DevOps Engineer  Location: Remote, US, Canada, UK, Germany  Role: Sr. DevOps Engineer  Reports to: Director, Infrastructure  Department: Infrastructure  Location: Remote, US, Canada, UK, Germany  Job Type: Full Time, Exempt  Help us Shape the Future of Data   Anaconda is the world’s most popular data science platform. With more than 30 million users, the open source Anaconda Distribution is the easiest way to do data science and machine learning. We pioneered the use of Python for data science, champion its vibrant community, and continue to steward open-source projects that make tomorrow’s innovations possible. Our enterprise-grade solutions enable corporate, research, and academic institutions around the world to harness the power of open source for competitive advantage and groundbreaking research.  Anaconda is seeking people who want to play a role in shaping the future of enterprise machine learning, and data science. Candidates should be knowledgeable and capable, but always eager to learn more and to teach others. Overall, we strive to create a culture of ability and humility and an environment that is both relaxed and focused. We stress empathy and collaboration with our customers, open-source users, and each other.  Here is why people love most about working here: We’re not just a company, we’re part of a movement. Our dedicated employees and user community are democratizing data science and creating and promoting open-source technologies for a better world, and our commercial offerings make it possible for enterprise users to leverage the most innovative output from open source in a secure, governed way.   Summary  Anaconda is seeking a talented Sr. DevOps Engineer to join our rapidly-growing company. This is an excellent opportunity for you to leverage your experience and skills and apply it to the world of data science and machine learning.   What You’ll Do:  Be a key member of the Anaconda Infrastructure team  Attend daily SCRUM meetings, sprint demos, etc.  Work across teams to coordinate joint deliverables  Work with QA team to ensure highest level of product quality  Create and maintain software documentation   What You Need: 5+ years minimum in a System Engineering or Backend Engineering role  GitOps mindset with a desire to reduce toil and automate everything  Results-driven, self-starter  approach to new projects  Deep Linux system administrator knowledge and experience  Knowledge base with Windows (automating) – Ansible  Deep understanding of core AWS services (IAM, EC2, VPC, etc.) Experience with IaC tools (Terraform, Ansible, Packer) Solid understanding of different compute architectures and operating systems  Experience managing complex CI/CD and software release infrastructure  Familiar with package lifecycle management  More about Automation – Improve Automation  Startup Mentality / Mindset  Team attitude: I am not done, until WE are done  Embody our core values:
 Ability & Humility  Innovation & Action  Empathy & Connection  Care deeply about fostering an environment where people of all backgrounds and experiences can flourish   What Will Make You Stand Out:  Relevant programming experience with Python or Go  Experience with workflow management tools (Airflow, Argo, Prefect) Mac Experience nice to have  Experience working in a fast-paced startup environment  Production Kubernetes experience (EKS preferred) Familiarity with CNCF ecosystem and its projects  Experience working in a fast-paced startup environment  Experience working in a open source or data science-oriented company   Why You’ll Like Working Here:  Unique opportunity to translate strong open source adoption and user enthusiasm into commercial product growth  Dynamic company that rewards high performers  On the cutting edge of enterprise application of data science, machine learning and AI  Collaborative team environment that values multiple perspectives and clear thinking  Employees-first culture  Flexible working hours  Medical, Dental, Vision, HSA, Life and 401K  Health and Remote working reimbursement  Paid parental leave – both mothers and fathers  Pre-IPO stock options  Open vacation policy and monthly company days off known as Snake Days 100% remote and flexible working policy we embrace this fully through how we operate as a company.  An Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability. Benefits of working as a Senior DevOps Engineer in Teletrabajo:● Company offers great benefits ● Opportunities to grow● Competitive salary● Remote Work opportunity

titulo_empleo: Estudio del impacto de tendencias de sostenibilidad en producción de banano_Consultor/a Ecuador - St
descripcion_empleo: We are looking to hire an experienced Estudio del impacto de tendencias de sostenibilidad en producción de banano_Consultor/a Ecuador to join our amazing team at Rainforest Alliance Consultants & Internships in Ecuador.Growing your career as a Full Time Estudio del impacto de tendencias de sostenibilidad en producción de banano_Consultor/a Ecuador is an awesome opportunity to develop relevant skills.If you are strong in creativity, cooperation and have the right experience for the job, then apply for the position of Estudio del impacto de tendencias de sostenibilidad en producción de banano_Consultor/a Ecuador at Rainforest Alliance Consultants & Internships today! SOLICITUD DE PROPUESTAS “Estudio del impacto de las tendencias de sostenibilidad del mercado en la producción de banano en Ecuador y Guatemala”  1.Antecedentes  Rainforest Alliance (RA) ha trabajado desde el año 1990 junto a productores de banano hacia modelos de producción más sostenible, y al año 2020, el programa de certificación de agricultura sostenible en Latinoamérica cuenta con 2,034 titulares de banano certificados, representado un área de 165,101 hectáreas certificadas y un alcance de 136,340 trabajadores. 1    Para avanzar en la transición hacia una agricultura sostenible y regenerativa 2 , es crucial aumentar la adopción de prácticas agrícolas más respetuosas con el medio ambiente. Para RA, el Manejo Integrado de Plagas (MIP) es un componente vital de un sector agrícola regenerativo, y parte de un enfoque climáticamente inteligente y holístico para el manejo de los ecosistemas. A través del programa de certificación de agricultura sostenible y la implementación de nuestra estrategia organizacional MIP, 3 nuestro objetivo es reducir el uso de plaguicidas mediante el fortalecimiento de las funciones del agroecosistema, a la vez que se aumenta la competitividad de los sectores productivos y la apertura de nuevos mercados más sostenibles. 2.Propósito del estudio   Como parte del proyecto macro titulado “Análisis e identificación del uso de agroquímicos en Latinoamérica en potenciales proyectos del sector bananero”,  uno de los principales objetivos es realizar un diagnóstico de la sostenibilidad, enfocado en prácticas de Manejo Integrado de Plagas y uso de plaguicidas. El alcance de esta investigación es fincas de banano en Ecuador y Guatemala.  Esta solicitud es para un consultor que apoye la recolección de datos en Ecuador.   Preguntas de investigación son parte de la metodología existente de Rainforest Alliance para la evaluación de adopción MIP y líneas base de plaguicidas, pero en resumen incluye las siguientes preguntas de investigación: 2.1 Preguntas de investigación ¿Qué prácticas de MIP implementan actualmente los productores en fincas de banano certificadas por Rainforest Alliance en Ecuador? ¿Cuáles son los resultados de la implementación? ¿Qué factores han facilitado o dificultado la adopción exitosa de nuevas prácticas? ¿Cuáles son las principales plagas/enfermedades y cuales plaguicidas son utilizados?  2.2 Diseño y metodología   Encuestas/entrevistas a productores/personal técnico en la finca utilizando una combinación de respuestas estructuradas y abiertas (implementadas usando la plataforma Survey123).  Se incluirán en el estudio 15 fincas por país, seleccionadas mediante un procedimiento de muestreo estratificado; Rainforest Alliance seleccionará a los productores para ser incluidos en el estudio y conectará a los consultores con los productores. 3.Entregables y cronograma  4.Perfil de consultor deseado   Basado en Ecuador  Experiencia en investigación en MIP, control de plagas, y/o uso de plaguicidas en fincas bananeras  Habilidades comprobadas y experiencia implementando encuestas cualitativas  Experiencia conduciendo auditorias para programas de certificación   5.Proceso de aplicación   Interesados/as deben subir a través de esta plataforma su propuesta que incluya:  CV actualizado  Una carta de presentación de no más de 2 páginas, describiendo su experiencia, investigación y habilidades relevantes.  Propuesta económica que incluya tarifa consultor por día, todos los impuestos de ley y gastos estimados por día.    Fecha límite: 27 de enero, 2023 ﻿ Nota: La contratación de este/a consultor/a está sujeta a la financiación de donantes  Benefits of working as a Estudio del impacto de tendencias de sostenibilidad en producción de banano_Consultor/a Ecuador in Ecuador:● Company offers great benefits ● Company offers career progression opportunities● Advantageous package

titulo_empleo: Jefe/a de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva Bi. - Hiring Immediately
descripcion_empleo: We are hiring an ambitious Jefe/a de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva Bi. to join our awesome team at Movistar in Quito, Quito (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Jefe/a de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva Bi. is a terrific opportunity to develop useful skills.If you are strong in teamwork, creativity and have the right mindset for the job, then apply for the position of Jefe/a de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva Bi. at Movistar today!En Telefónica-Movistar, hemos puesto en marcha un nuevo modelo operativo, unificando las operaciones de Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, México, Perú, Uruguay y Venezuela, para formar Telefónica Hispanoamérica. Tenemos como misión hacer nuestro mundo más humano, conectando la vida de las personas, entendemos que son ustedes quienes le dan sentido a la tecnología y no al revés. Creemos en el poder transformador de la diversidad, la equidad y la inclusión tanto para el negocio como para la sociedad, por eso nos enfocamos en seguir impulsando una cultura de trabajo abierta que atraiga talento, unimos a las personas y las invitamos a ser ellas mismas, a expresarse, a compartir. Dirección: Big Data  Área: Business Intelligence/Big Data  Ubicación/Domicilio: Quito Misión del Rol ? Gestionar los equipos de Analítica Descriptiva y Operaciones de BI de cara al cumplimiento de los compromisos con el negocio en cuanto a la entrega de información, precisa y oportuna. Funciones Asociadas al Rol ? Gestionar al equipo de Analítica Descriptiva de manera que sea capaz de capturar las necesidades del usuario y asesorar de manera adecuada al negocio sobre las soluciones relacionadas con datos. ? Gestionar al equipo de Operaciones y producción de modo que se asegure la entrega continua, oportuna y con calidad de la información necesaria para el negocio. ? Apoyar a las áreas de negocio en la definición de los requerimientos de información. ? Gestionar la demanda de requerimientos priorizándolos en función de los criterios que minimicen pérdidas económicas, sanciones regulatorias y maximicen los ingresos a la compañía. ? Gestionar las acciones necesarias con IT para la construcción de requerimientos. ? Gestionar las acciones necesarias dentro de BI de cara a la entrega de información a las áreas de negocio. ? Llevar las métricas de los requerimientos gestionados y entregados. ? Gestionar con las áreas de negocio para el desarrollo de las pruebas de los requerimientos. ? Gestionar manejo de Incidentes de producción generados a partir de los diferentes ETLs programados desde las fuentes de información. ? Entendimiento y correcta documentación de los diferentes requerimientos de negocio. Requisitos Indispensables ? Educación: Título profesional de Ingeniero en las áreas de informática, sistemas, telecomunicaciones, computación o afín. ? Experiencia de 5 años posiciones similares, liderazgo de equipos. Excluyente ? Experiencia comprobable en análisis de datos. Excluyente ? Entendimiento end-to-end del flujo de los datos (desde la ingesta hasta la capa de consumo o explotación)? Experiencia con métricas, recopilación, seguimiento y presentación de informes. ? Habilidades analíticas, y cuantitativas. ? Habilidad para aprender rápidamente nuevas herramientas a medida que la tecnología evoluciona. ? Conocimientos y enfoque en diseño por defecto. ? Experiencia en gestión de proyectos ? Experiencia en generación de procesos y estrategias de gestión del cambio. ? Experiencia en modelamiento de datos. ? Conocimiento de herramientas de visualización ejemplo Power BI. Excluyente Requisitos Deseables ? Deseable experiencia en entornos de BI/Big Data, Datawarehousing y Big Data (CDP, Hive, HBase, Kafka y Nifi, Spark, AWS)? Deseable conocimientos en el área de bases de datos y desarrollo de ETLs usando motores relacionales. ? Deseable habilidades de programación en Phyton, Spark, R, Pyspark, Shell Linux, ETL de SQL Server. Competencias ? Liderazgo ? Foco en el cliente ? Maneja la complejidad ? titulo_empleo: TTech_Services Delivery and Partner Manager
descripcion_empleo: WHAT IS TELEFONICA CYBERSECURTY & CLOUD TECH?? We are a global leading company in digital transformation and the cradle of talent in Cybersecurity and Cloud. In Telefonica Tech we unlock the power of integrating technology. Innovation and continuous learning define us. We look for new ways of doing things, fresh and innovative ideas, experimenting, having fun and being enthusiastic in what we do. We are techies and we want to improve the world by making it more diverse, sustainable, and cyber-safe. We work hard so our customers don't have to worry about their risks in digital life. We make security more humane by generating trust and peace of mind.    WHAT DO WE DO ON THE TEAM? TCCT Germany Services Delivery and Partner Manager Team manages the operational processes and service contractual aspects of current projects and the development of new delivery concepts together with Partners, in accordance with the company strategy YOUR DAY-TO-DAY WORK… As a Service Delivery and Partner Manager for Telefonica Tech accounts, you will provide world class service account management with end-to-end accountability for aligned service fulfillment to agreed terms and conditions in a global contract.  TCCT Germany expects for its Services Delivery and Partner Manager to have a deep focus on operational processes and service contractual aspects in order to support the optimal delivery of current projects and the development of new delivery concepts together with Partners, in accordance with the company strategy. You will need to be an effective team player, with strong influencing and relationship management skills and a customer centric approach, that can balance a range of conflicting interests, as well as the ability of defining Partner related processes and contractual aspects for new services and/or commercialization schemes. Your main responsibilities as a Services D&P Manager will involve:Establishing strong service relationships with service providers, TCCT Germany, affiliates and partners, and third-party service providers with key decision and influencers.Undertaking regular service improvement initiatives, including contributing to pre- and sales strategies as well as customer service fulfillment. SDPM will be in charge of optimizing current process related to the services (PO issuance, Service activation, Invoicing, SLAs) towards Customers and Vendors/ Partners, in order to align the strategy of the company and provide optimal service levels. As such SDPM will act as TCCT Germany local coordination point between the different stakeholders involved (operation, client, suppliers, commercial areas)SDPM is responsible for defining and validating Service Delivery Process that explains Partners and/or Customers all the details of provisioned Services and how to interact with TCCT Germany and their affiliates. SLA internal accounting and interaction with TCCT Germany service providers to record and collect SLA. SDPM is responsible for Monthly Service Reviews of Contracted Services and Benchmarking against Committed Service Level Agreement to ensure total customer satisfaction and SLA performance tracking. SDPM is also responsible for SLA violation penalties calculation and reporting in addition to generating, when applicable, SLA Credit Violation. Monthly reporting that clearly outline service levels achieved during each month benchmarked against Service Level expected by the customer.SDPM validates that the SLA definition and Escalation matrix complies with TCCT Germany standards, and that the information contained in it will suffice all the necessary information to properly handle and include the related parts in the event of an incident.SDPM will have a central role as a coordination point during Handover of the Sales / Pre Sales Area towards the Operations area.SDPM will be responsible of implementing and maintaining a repository that allows monitoring AND FOR THAT, WE THINK IT WOULD BE IDEAL FOR YOU TO HAVE...  What you bring PMP, ITIL certified, ideally with an engineering, technology, or business-related qualification German / English language communications skills to a business standard (Spanish very valuable). A track record of success leading virtual service teams on global service delivery for enterprise accounts. Experience in Vendor & Partner and/or Contract Management. International project management expertise for custom-made implementation projects Deep knowledge of IT, Cyber Security, IT, Telecom (preferably) and data application development, operations with a special focus on their process-aspects in the Customer/Provider/Third-party relationship.A proven ability to work with international and distributed virtual teams, supported by a proven capability to work in a matrix organizationAre you ready? We are. And if this looks like your dream match, we’d like to connect with you!#We are diverse #Weencourageequality We’re proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and employer. In Telefonica Tech we are convinced that a diverse and inclusive team is more innovative, transformative, achieves better results and makes us better. That is why we promote and guarantee the inclusion of all people regardless of race, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation or expression, culture, disability, or any other personal condition.  Location is flexible, depending on where the candidate currently resides. Applicants must be authorized to work in the US without requiring visa sponsorship now or in the future. We want to get to know you!

titulo_empleo: Asistente Administrativo Contable Temporal Periodo Maternidad. - Urgent Role
descripcion_empleo: We are looking for an energetic Asistente Administrativo Contable Temporal Periodo Maternidad. to join our vibrant team at CONFIDENCIAL in Guayaquil, Guayaquil (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Asistente Administrativo Contable Temporal Periodo Maternidad. is an awesome opportunity to develop excellent skills.If you are strong in critical thinking, creativity and have the right drive for the job, then apply for the position of Asistente Administrativo Contable Temporal Periodo Maternidad. at CONFIDENCIAL today!Requisitos: Sexo: Femenino Experiencia laboral mínima de 3 a 5 años en el mismo cargo. Formación Académica: Título de tercer nivel en CPA, Administración de Empresas. Funciones principales: Elaborar y registrar Facturas de ventas. Manejo de cobros con tarjetas de crédito. Análisis y liquidación de ingresos por cobros con tarjetas de crédito. Elaborar conciliaciones bancarias. Realizar y enviar al bancos cartas por concepto de débitos bancarios. Elaborar y presentar formularios por declaraciones de IVA e Impuesto a la renta mensuales. Realizar y presentar anexos transaccionales simplificados. Manejo de aspectos tributarios Elaboración de ICT Realizar reporte de ventas. Realizar tomas físicas de inventarios. Revisar y analizar reportes de consumos de inventarios mensuales. Importaciones: 1. Elaborar cuadro de importaciones para revisar el stock de mercadería y las ventas. 2. Valorar una nueva orden. 3. Cubicar una nueva orden para saber el volumen total y ver si se trata de una carga FCL o LCL. 4. Enviar la orden al proveedor. 5. Recibir, revisar la proforma para confirmar la orden al proveedor. 6. Hacer Transferencias al Exterior, ingresar los datos bancarios de cada proveedor para transferir los fondos y pueda empezar la producción de la orden o para pagar una orden de crédito. 7. Descargar los documentos de soporte de cada transferencia al exterior y entregar a contabilidad para que tramiten el pago. 8. Entregar información de cada orden nueva a la persona encargada de hacer el flujo de importaciones. 9. Crear códigos de mercadería nueva. 10. Ingresar en el sistema a proveedores nuevos, la marca, las partidas arancelarias, los puertos. 11. Crear el pedido de importación en el sistema. 12. Solicitar a Diseño Gráfico los diseños de cartones, stickers, hang tags para productos nuevos. 13. Solicitar códigos de barra y números de serie para importaciones nuevas. 14. Coordinar el seguro para cada carga. 15. Coordinar el embarque y solicitar la documentación respectiva. 16. Solicitar a contabilidad el pago del flete de las importaciones. 17. Preparar y Enviar los documentos originales de embarque al Despachador de Aduana. 18. Descargar la Declaración de Importación y Liquidación de Aduana del Sistema de ECUAPASS y archivar como soporte de la importación realizada. 19. Solicitar a contabilidad el pago para la Aduana y poder nacionalizar la mercadería. 20. Generar el packing list en el sistema por cada importación que llega para que se envíen los códigos EAN a bodega principal.. 21. Informar a la bodega de la llegada de la mercadería. 22. Entre otras actividades relacionadas con el cargo. Presupuestos. Elaboración de Estados Financieros Control y supervisión de auditoria externa. Manejo de pago a proveedores. Manejo de página del MRL y nómina Análisis y presentación de estados financieros y balances. Proveer información primaria para el seguimiento y ejecución de control presupuestario. Revisar novedades presentadas en el proceso de gestión de las áreas a cargo. Elaborar y generar informes y reportes de inversiones para cumplir con los organismos de control. Elaborar y presentar los estados financieros de las empresas tenedoras de acciones. Revisar y analizar las cuentas contables de las empresas a su cargo. Ejecutar y cumplir con las obligaciones tributarias de las empresas a su cargo. Coordinar y supervisar todos los trámites legales. Controlar y dar seguimiento al vencimiento de las inversiones. Analizar y proponer nuevas inversiones. Atender y procesar los pagos a proveedores. Mantener actualizada las informacion para la Presidencia Ejecutiva. Elaborar cronograma de pagos y distribuir dividendos a accionistas. Controlar y manejar el flujo para inversiones. Conocimientos: Legislación tributaria, NIIF¨S, Contabilidad General, Pago a proveedores, leyes societarias y laborales, estados financieros, informes contable, tributarios. Manejo de Utilitarios Indispensable. (indispensable). La persona estará encargada de organizar la información contable para registro y obtención de balances, manejo de control de asistencia de los colaboradores, analizar y certificar información financiera para los entes controles. Se evaluarán competencias como puntualidad, calidad de trabajo, comunicación, confianza, seguridad, capacidad para la toma de decisiones, iniciativa, compromiso, entre otros. Benefits of working as a Asistente Administrativo Contable Temporal Periodo Maternidad. in Guayaquil, Guayaquil (canton):● Company offers great benefits ● Advancement opportunities● Attractive package

titulo_empleo: Human Resources Assistant - Hiring Now
descripcion_empleo: We are hiring an enthusiastic Human Resources Assistant to join our vibrant team at Tormeka in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Human Resources Assistant is an incredible opportunity to develop competitive skills.If you are strong in critical thinking, creativity and have the right experience for the job, then apply for the position of Human Resources Assistant at Tormeka today!  RESPONSIBILITIES Assisting HR with the process of recruitment, including sourcing candidates, assisting with interviews, and issuing employment contracts. Designing and implementing an overall recruiting strategy and coordinating logistics for new hire orientations. Developing and updating s and job specifications. Building rapport and understanding with candidates that the company represents. Assisting in promoting the company’s services to candidates. Building and maintaining a database of candidates and entering employee data into this database. Conducting interviews using various reliable personnel selection tools/ methods to filter candidates within schedule. Processing payroll and assisting with the documentation of employee compensation and benefits. Supporting HR-related training programs, workshops, and seminars. Assists with planning and execution of special events such as benefits enrolment, organization-wide meetings, employee recognition events, holiday parties, and retirement celebrations. REQUIREMENTS Must have a degree or experience in Human Resources or Psychology. Must be fluent in both written and spoken English. Additional languages are a bonus. Good interpersonal skills, a “people person.” Working knowledge of HR functions and best practices. Showing good time management and interpersonal skills with the ability to manage sensitive and confidential situations with tact, professionalism, and diplomacy. Strong communication skills in both written and verbal form. Always have a professional manner. Showing excellent organizational skills and attention to detail. To be a results-driven individual with a positive, “can-do” attitude. Knowledge of computer applications and HR-specific software programs. **Working hours (Central European Time): Monday to Thursday: 8am to 5pm Friday: 8am to 3pm Basic salary: 400 Euros per month  Apply for this Human Resources Assistant position Benefits of working as a Human Resources Assistant in Teletrabajo:● Excellent benefits● Opportunities to grow● Advantageous package

titulo_empleo: Picker - Tumbaco - Pedidos Ya Market. - Hiring Immediately
descripcion_empleo: We are hiring a focused Picker - Tumbaco - Pedidos Ya Market. to join our amazing team at PedidosYa Markets in Quito, Quito (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Picker - Tumbaco - Pedidos Ya Market. is an amazing opportunity to develop exceptional skills.If you are strong in decision-making, planning and have the right initiative for the job, then apply for the position of Picker - Tumbaco - Pedidos Ya Market. at PedidosYa Markets today!PedidosYa es la empresa de tecnología líder en delivery y Quick Commerce presente en 15 países de América Latina. Nuestro objetivo es brindar experiencias únicas a nuestras personas usuarias a través de nuestra pasión por la tecnología. Somos parte de Delivery Hero, compañía alemana líder mundial en Quick Commerce. ¡Somos un equipo inquieto de más de 6000 personas y siempre vamos por más! Estamos siempre buscando personas con ganas de crear en cada momento, apasionadas por lo que hacen, y sobre todo, que quieran jugar en equipo. El equipo de PedidosYa Market está creciendo y te buscamos a ti para que seas parte de uno de los negocios que más se ha expandido dentro de nuestra compañía. PedidosYa Market es un desarrollo de PeYa basado en la tercera generación del Quick Commerce, donde la experiencia del usuario es el foco y el éxito del negocio. El negocio dentro de la aplicación funciona como una cadena de locales, estratégicamente ubicados, cerrados al público y destinados solo a la venta online y la entrega por delivery. ¿Te quieres sumar? Tenemos una oportunidad para ti, estamos buscando Picker (armador de pedidos) en Tumbaco. ¿Qué desafíos te esperan?* Realizar el picking (armado de pedido) y el empaquetamiento de las órdenes asegurando el nivel de servicio esperado (realizar pedido en tiempo y forma, alineado al proceso de empaquetado correcto y sin modificar las órdenes). * Recibir y stockear mercadería cumpliendo los estándares de seguridad, higiene y orden de la compañía. titulo_empleo: Engineering Manager - with Growth Opportunities
descripcion_empleo:
We are searching for a hardworking Engineering Manager to join our growing team at ITExpert in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time Engineering Manager is an awesome opportunity to develop useful skills.If you are strong in persuasion, leadership and have the right drive for the job, then apply for the position of Engineering Manager at ITExpert today! As an engineering leader in SOCi, you will work with your counterparts in Product Management and Design to deliver valuable products to our customers. You create a culture of learning, exploration, customer-centricity and proactive problem-solving. 
 You ensure that every member of your team is partnering strongly with their respective counterparts in Product and Design, to form cross-functional Empowered Product Teams. You understand the difference between mercenary and missionary engineering teams, and set the direction to ensure the latter is happening. You’ve learned about the costs of top-down, command-and-control leadership and abhor it, instead aspiring to be a Servant Leader. You know how to create a sense of purpose and drive in the organization. You value learning above everything else, and expect that from your teams. You quickly recognize waste and inefficiencies and eliminate them on sight.  Strong technical background, as well as deep understanding of modern product management (Marty Cagan, Dan Olsen etc school of thought) and modern software development (Tom & Mary Poppendieck, Woody Zuil, Allen Holub, etc) practices will be critical to your success. You are able to speak both with engineers as well as product managers and designers in their own language and build trust, credibility and joint success in delivering valuable customer outcomes.  Being responsible for your team, you take a strong interest in their growth and career development - you are keenly aware that investing in people is the key to great technology and products. You do so through mentoring, guidance, servant leadership and radical candor.   Requirements: 7+ years in hands-on engineering roles (4+ in senior / principal level)5+ years in managing teams of at least 10 engineers  Solid understanding of AWS Well-Architected Framework, DevOps maturity framework and micro-service architectures  Solid understanding of OOP, relational database design, functional programming, and PHP/JS/MySQL  Strong product orientation with a track record of building great products  Strong track record of building well-performing teams  Solid understanding of Lean (“Lean Software Development” [Poppendieck], “Goal” [Goldratt]) Deep understanding modern Product Management techniques (“Inspired” & “Empowered” [Cagan], “Lean Product Playbook” [Olsen], etc) Skilled in giving feedback, creating accountability and building trust (“Crucial Accountability” [Patterson], “Radical Candor” [Scott], “Speed of Trust” [Covey], etc) Deep understanding of creating and facilitating learning organizations (“Fifth Discipline” [Senge]) Demonstrated track record of partnership with product management and product designers   About Us:  SOCi is one of the fastest growing technology companies in the country, ranking in the top tier of Inc 5000’s Fastest Growing Companies in America list for the last 4 years in a row. The builder of an award-winning enterprise SaaS marketing platform, and one of Forbes’ Best Startup Employers, SOCi boasts hundreds of the world’s largest brands as its customers. The SOCi platform specifically solves complicated marketing and workflow problems for national and global multi-location brands that want to scale and optimize their presence across search, social, reviews, listening, ads, bots, and more. As the largest localized marketing platform in the world, SOCi makes the impossible possible by enabling top brands and their locations to strengthen and scale their digital presence across limitless locations.   Our accolades include:  Recently closed a Series D investment round of $80 million, led by JMI Equity 4x honoree on Inc. 5000 Fastest Growing Companies in America 2x honoree on Financial Times’ Fastest Growing Companies 3x CEO Finalist for Ernst & Young’s Entrepreneur of the Year award  Winner of the MarTech Breakthrough Award for Best Overall Social Media Management Platform #1 Rank by Entrepreneur magazine’s Top Marketing Providers for Franchises, three years in a row  Front Runner for Gartner award in Reputation Management & Brand Management 2021 Honoree on Forbes America’s Best Startup Employers   What's SOCi's culture like? Led by a team of industry experts, SOCi is leading the pack in Localized Marketing for Multi-Location brands. Our passionate team of SOCialites work from home around the globe! This position is remote and thereby needing stable internet connection to be successful in this role. We offer flexible PTO, comprehensive health & benefits packages, 401k and matching (amongst many other perks). Every new team member is equipped with a MacBook laptop, tech accessories & SOCi swag. We are a fast-paced, agile environment where thought leadership and input is encouraged. If you are looking for a place where you can come and make a difference in the way enterprise organizations utilize social technology, then SOCi is for you.  SOCi is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex including sexual orientation and gender identity, national origin, disability, protected Veteran Status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law. Benefits of working as a Engineering Manager in Teletrabajo:● Learning opportunities● Company offers career progression opportunities● Attractive package● Remote Work opportunity

titulo_empleo: OPERADOR LÍDER DE DESPACHO - Urgent
descripcion_empleo:
We are looking to hire a hardworking OPERADOR LÍDER DE DESPACHO to join our awesome team at Holcim Ecuador S.A. in Guayaquil, Guayaquil (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time OPERADOR LÍDER DE DESPACHO is an amazing opportunity to develop relevant skills.If you are strong in persuasion, cooperation and have the right experience for the job, then apply for the position of OPERADOR LÍDER DE DESPACHO at Holcim Ecuador S.A. today!Objetivo del cargo Dar seguimiento al cargue y manejo de inventarios de los productos en el área de despacho, controlando su grupo a cargo, la operación de los equipos y la limpieza del área tanto de cemento en sacos, big bags cómo granel y despacho de clinker; cumpliendo con los requisitos de servicio al cliente, H&S y procedimientos aplicables. Roles y principales responsabilidades: Ejecutar y reportar a diario las novedades de los turnos de despachos dando seguimiento a los rendimiento de los equipos, los tiempos de falla, los volúmenes despachados y en general las novedades presentadas durante el turno. Garantizar la satisfacción del cliente dando seguimiento a los procesos de cargue y tomando medidas en caso de ser necesario. Garantizar el cargue de productos especiales y la rotación del inventario en sala. Mantener control y seguimiento al inventario de los productos en sala. Dar seguimiento al buen funcionamiento de los equipos de envase, paletizado, carga de granel y montacargas del área reportando cualquier anomalía o contribuyendo a la reparación. Reportar las novedades de montacargas, paletizadora, envasadora, sistemas de despacho, balanzas, filtros, elevadores,etc. Garantizar el housekeeping en las áreas bajo su responsabilidad. Asegurar el desarrollo integral de los colaboradores bajo su liderazgo, manteniendo un clima laboral sano, de colaboración e integridad.
Requisitos académicos y experiencia: Tecnico - Tecnologo o de preferencia profesional graduado o mínimo cursando los últimos años en Ingeniería Industrial, logística y afines. Experiencia 2 años en manejo de inventarios, administración de bodega o cargos similares.
Competencias técnicas: Control de Inventarios. Gestión del Servicio Gestión de mantenimiento Manejo de Software de Despacho
Oficina o lugar de trabajo: Planta Guayaquil
Benefits of working as a OPERADOR LÍDER DE DESPACHO in Guayaquil, Guayaquil (canton):● Learning opportunities● Advancement opportunities● Attractive package

titulo_empleo: Cyber Security Pre Sales Specialist - Hiring Immediately
descripcion_empleo: We are looking to hire a creative Cyber Security Pre Sales Specialist to join our high calibre team at (0039) IBM del Ecuador, C.A. in Quito, Quito (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time Cyber Security Pre Sales Specialist is an awesome opportunity to develop excellent skills.If you are strong in problem-solving, project management and have the right drive for the job, then apply for the position of Cyber Security Pre Sales Specialist at (0039) IBM del Ecuador, C.A. today!Introduction  The sales teams at IBM are world-renowned for being industry’s top experts in the profession. As a Seller at IBM, you will have the opportunity to use one of the most innovative and extensive portfolios of products and services to bring best in breed solutions to IBM’s clients.  Work with world class organizations to help them understand how IBM solutions can contribute to their overall success and master business relationships to become a trusted advisor to your customers. Your Role and Responsibilities  To work with clients, partners, and other areas of IBM as a Subject Matter Expert in the pre-sale, use, and adoption of cyber security solutions.  To define cyber security architectures and solutions together with clients, partners, and other areas of IBM.  To execute demonstrations and proofs of concept to show and confirm the advantages and capabilities of the solutions from the cyber security software portfolio.  To solve queries and problems that may arise because of the use of solutions from the cybersecurity portfolio.  To recommend best practices and propose improvements in the use of portfolio solutions.  Required Technical and Professional Expertise  Practical experience in the use and/or technical prevention of cybersecurity solutions  Knowledge of reference models associated with computer security and cybersecurity  Knowledge of the solutions and portfolio of relevant manufacturers in the industry  Knowledge in any of the following areas ISO 27000, NIST, Zero Trust, DAM, IAM, PAM  Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  Intermediate knowledge of containers, Kubernetes and microservices Benefits of working as a Cyber Security Pre Sales Specialist in Quito, Quito (canton):● Excellent benefits● Opportunities to grow● Advantageous package

titulo_empleo: BizOps (Sales/Marketing ops) Craftsman - with Great Benefits
descripcion_empleo:
We are hiring a driven BizOps (Sales/Marketing ops) Craftsman to join our awesome team at Echo in Teletrabajo.Growing your career as a Full Time BizOps (Sales/Marketing ops) Craftsman is a fantastic opportunity to develop relevant skills.If you are strong in project management, decision-making and have the right drive for the job, then apply for the position of BizOps (Sales/Marketing ops) Craftsman at Echo today! Note:  This is a startup. We're growing 500%/year and we need someone fairly technical, who can keep our sales-marketing related integrations running, build reports, and be the glue that holds the sales and marketing workflow together. We want to hire someone who has done this before, or has significant experience doing something similar. If you have never worked at a startup, this may not be a good fit. It's fast-paced, and we're building everything from scratch.
  About You  You know sales and you know systems. You cannot stand for anything less than high-quality customer interactions. You know how to measure, and create systems that help you continually take yourself out of the process, and put those evolving pieces into the sales system. You are a builder at your core, and love a complex challenge with lots of moving pieces.   What You’ll Do  Own all sales and marketing systems, including installation of new software, integrations between the CRM, marketing automation platform, and other business apps, building zaps and reports, and generally maintaining the sales and marketing tech stack and workflow so that it flows smoothly and allows for peak productivity and quality.  Set up sales automations to improve MQL to SQL close rate for form fills, abandoned carts, and other leads. Ensure that every lead is touched according to an SLA, and create the necessary integrations, automations, and supporting reports to facilitate this.  Provide actionable insight (to management, and reps) on what impacts sales and what impacts churn.  Track performance on a team and individual level. Benefits of working as a BizOps (Sales/Marketing ops) Craftsman in Teletrabajo:● Company offers great benefits ● Advancement opportunities● Attractive package

titulo_empleo: EC. Jefe/a de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva BI - Hiring Immediately
descripcion_empleo: We are hiring a focused EC. Jefe/a de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva BI to join our amazing team at Telefónica S.A. in Quito, Quito (canton).Growing your career as a Full Time EC. Jefe/a de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva BI is an amazing opportunity to develop productive skills.If you are strong in communication, teamwork and have the right initiative for the job, then apply for the position of EC. Jefe/a de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva BI at Telefónica S.A. today! ECU -  Jefe de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva BI  En Telefónica-Movistar, hemos puesto en marcha un nuevo modelo operativo, unificando las operaciones de Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, México, Perú, Uruguay y Venezuela, para formar Telefónica Hispanoamérica. Tenemos como misión hacer nuestro mundo más humano, conectando la vida de las personas, entendemos que son ustedes quienes le dan sentido a la tecnología y no al revés.  Creemos en el poder transformador de la diversidad, la equidad y la inclusión tanto para el negocio como para la sociedad, por eso nos enfocamos en seguir impulsando una cultura de trabajo abierta que atraiga talento, unimos a las personas y las invitamos a ser ellas mismas, a expresarse, a compartir.  Dirección:   Big Data  Área:  Business Intelligence/Big Data  Ubicación/Domicilio:  Quito  Misión del Rol •    Gestionar los equipos de Analítica Descriptiva y Operaciones de BI de cara al cumplimiento de los compromisos con el negocio en cuanto a la entrega de información, precisa y oportuna.  Funciones Asociadas al Rol •    Gestionar al equipo de Analítica Descriptiva de manera que sea capaz de capturar las necesidades del usuario y asesorar de manera adecuada al negocio sobre las soluciones relacionadas con datos. •    Gestionar al equipo de Operaciones y producción de modo que se asegure la entrega continua, oportuna y con calidad de la información necesaria para el negocio. •    Apoyar a las áreas de negocio en la definición de los requerimientos de información. •    Gestionar la demanda de requerimientos priorizándolos en función de los criterios que minimicen pérdidas económicas, sanciones regulatorias y maximicen los ingresos a la compañía. •    Gestionar las acciones necesarias con IT para la construcción de requerimientos. •    Gestionar las acciones necesarias dentro de BI de cara a la entrega de información a las áreas de negocio. •    Llevar las métricas de los requerimientos gestionados y entregados. •    Gestionar con las áreas de negocio para el desarrollo de las pruebas de los requerimientos. •    Gestionar manejo de Incidentes de producción generados a partir de los diferentes ETLs programados desde las fuentes de información. •    Entendimiento y correcta documentación de los diferentes requerimientos de negocio.  Requisitos Indispensables •    Educación: Título profesional de Ingeniero en las áreas de informática, sistemas, telecomunicaciones, computación o afín. •    Experiencia  de 5 años posiciones similares, liderazgo de equipos. Excluyente •    Experiencia comprobable en análisis de datos. Excluyente •    Entendimiento end-to-end del flujo de los datos (desde la ingesta hasta la capa de consumo o explotación)•    Experiencia con métricas, recopilación, seguimiento y presentación de informes. •    Habilidades analíticas, y cuantitativas. •    Habilidad para aprender rápidamente nuevas herramientas a medida que la tecnología evoluciona. •    Conocimientos y enfoque en diseño por defecto. •    Experiencia en gestión de proyectos •    Experiencia en generación de procesos y estrategias de gestión del cambio. •    Experiencia en modelamiento de datos. •    Conocimiento de herramientas de visualización ejemplo Power BI. Excluyente  Requisitos Deseables •    Deseable experiencia en entornos de BI/Big Data, Datawarehousing y Big Data (CDP, Hive, HBase, Kafka y Nifi, Spark, AWS)•    Deseable conocimientos en el área de bases de datos y desarrollo de ETLs usando motores relacionales. •    Deseable habilidades de programación en Phyton, Spark, R, Pyspark, Shell Linux, ETL de SQL Server.  Competencias •    Liderazgo •    Foco en el cliente •    Maneja la complejidad •    Promueve el compromiso del talento de transformación digital y lo retiene. •    Establecer y alcanzar objetivos ambiciosos. •    Genera confianza y credibilidad  Beneficios •    Bono por desempeño •    Home office •    Flex time •    Seguro de Salud - Vida - Dental (Seguros Privados) •    Plan de celular ilimitado - Descuentos familiares •    Días adicionales de vacaciones •    Día por Cumpleaños •    Licencias diferenciadoras en caso de Maternidad/Paternidad •    Family Pet Friday •    Programa de formación en Universidades Internacionales “Hacer nuestro mundo más humano, conectando la vida de las personas”Benefits of working as a EC. Jefe/a de Operación y Analítica Descriptiva BI in Quito, Quito (canton):● Learning opportunities● Advancement opportunities● Advantageous package
